Money talks. I don't. We've got an efficient relationship.
I used to have one rule—don't get involved in other people's problems. Why are things so complicated now?
Crime is a game, and I play to win. I have no sympathy for players who don't get that.
This organization has a lot of folks who cling to ugly, brutal practices. I'm not like that. I'm a professional, and professionals have standards.

entries.caption: Clasp Member Ideals
rows: {@b By Any Means}. I complete jobs. Collateral damage isn't my problem. (Chaotic)
{@b Ambition}. I will climb to the top of the ladder. Everything I do is a stepping-stone to a Spireling's position. (Neutral)
{@b Decisiveness}. It's important to make up your mind so you can act swiftly and without delay. (Neutral)
{@b Honor}. There's room in the {@book Clasp|TDCSR|2|The Clasp} for both good and evil. Every day, I awake and choose to do what's right. (Good)
{@b Family}. The {@book Clasp|TDCSR|2|The Clasp} is family. Anything that's good for the family is good for me. (Lawful)
{@b Self-Interest}. There are too many bleeding hearts in the {@book Clasp|TDCSR|2|The Clasp} these days. Doing the right thing means doing the thing that makes my life better. (Evil)

entries.caption: Clasp Member Bonds
rows: I'd do anything—anything—to protect my comrades.
I'll always be grateful to the Spireling who took me in when I was an orphaned kid.

I was inspired to join the {@book Clasp|TDCSR|2|The Clasp} by the stories my parents told of being saved from the {@book Chroma Conclave's|TDCSR|1|The Chroma Conclave} attack on {@book Emon|TDCSR|3|Emon, the City of Fellowship}. I can look past the organization's flaws.
I was nearly killed by the {@book Myriad|TDCSR|2|The Myriad}. If the {@book Clasp|TDCSR|2|The Clasp} is the enemy of those villains, then the {@book Clasp|TDCSR|2|The Clasp} is my friend.
I've got family back in the old town who are counting on me for money. They don't know how I get it, but they don't need to know.
I joined the {@book Clasp|TDCSR|2|The Clasp} to become rich, powerful, and beloved. That's all there is to it.

entries.caption: Clasp Member Flaws
rows: I'm hopeless at organizing my belongings, and I'm always losing things.
I get bored whenever a plan is going too smoothly. A win is always more fun when it's by the skin of my teeth!
I've seen Spirelings walk out among cheering crowds of thousands. Gods, I wish that were me. I need that to be me.
I'm rubbish with money, and never seem to leave town with a full purse. Keeps me coming back to the life, I suppose.
I can't work with shoddy, makeshift {@item thieves' tools|PHB}. I need everything involving my work to be perfect.
Any slight against me, no matter how small, is cause for revenge.

_.displayName: The scholar's robes of your cloister
borrowed book on the subject of your current study

items.name: Habilidades:
items.entry: {@skill History}, más uno a elegir entre {@skill Arcana}, {@skill Nature} y {@skill Religion}

items.name: Equipamiento:
items.entry: El {@item robes|phb} de erudito de tu claustro, un kit de escritura (pequeño {@item pouch|phb} con una pluma, tinta, pergamino doblado y una pequeña navaja), un {@item book|phb} prestado sobre el tema de tu estudio actual y un {@item pouch|phb} que contiene 10 gp.

entries.name: Función: Acceso a la biblioteca
entries: Mientras que otros deben a menudo soportar extensas entrevistas e importantes cuotas para acceder incluso a los archivos más comunes de su biblioteca, usted tiene acceso libre y fácil a la mayor parte de la biblioteca, aunque también puede tener depósitos de lore que son demasiado valiosos, mágicos o secretos para permitir a cualquiera el acceso inmediato.
Tiene un conocimiento práctico del personal y la burocracia de su claustro, y sabe cómo navegar por esas conexiones con cierta facilidad.
Además, es probable que obtenga un trato preferente en otras bibliotecas de los Reinos, como cortesía profesional hacia un compañero de estudios.

entries.name: Características sugeridas
entries: Utiliza las tablas de trasfondo {@background sage} del Manual del Jugador como base para tus rasgos y motivaciones, modificando las entradas cuando sea apropiado para adaptarlas a tu identidad de erudito enclaustrado.

Su vínculo está casi seguramente asociado con el lugar donde creció o con los conocimientos que espera adquirir a través de las aventuras. Tu ideal está sin duda relacionado con la forma en que ves la búsqueda del conocimiento y de la verdad: quizás como un objetivo digno en sí mismo, o quizás como un medio para alcanzar un fin deseable.

items.name: Competencias en herramientas:
items.entry: Un tipo de {@filter herramientas del artesano|items|source=phb|miscellaneous=mundane|type=artisan's tools}

items.name: Equipamiento:
items.entry: Un {@item two-person tent|phb}, {@filter herramientas del artesano|items|source=phb|miscellaneous=mundane|type=artisan's tools}, un {@item holy symbol|phb}, un conjunto de {@item traveler's clothes|phb}, un cinturón {@item pouch|phb} que contiene 5 gp

entries.name: Estilo de vida
entries: Pobre

entries.name: Visión general
entries: Eres uno de los cientos de refugiados que fueron expulsados de Hillsfar o que huyeron de la destrucción de Myth Drannor y que ahora se refugian en campamentos ocultos bajo los aleros del norte del bosque de Cormanthor. Si has crecido en los campamentos, nunca has estado en otro asentamiento que no sea la aldea de Elventree. Como huésped de los elfos, has aprendido sus costumbres y las del bosque. También estás traumatizado, ya que la magia salvaje residual, las energías liberadas por la caída de Thultanar sobre Myth Drannor, y el miedo constante a las incursiones a la caza de no humanos para luchar en la Arena de Hillsfar han hecho mella en ti, como en todos los de los campamentos.

entries.name: Reportaje: Refugio del clero élfico
entries: Los clérigos de Elventree han jurado cuidar de los refugiados de Cormanthor. Te ayudarán cuando puedan, incluso proporcionándote a ti y a tus compañeros curaciones y cuidados gratuitos en templos, santuarios y otras presencias establecidas en Elventree. También te proporcionarán (pero sólo a ti) un estilo de vida pobre. Nota: Este rasgo es una variante del rasgo Acólito.

rows: I long for a home that never really existed, whether in the camps, Hillsfar, or Myth Drannor.
Though I am not an elf, I am a fervent, radical worshipper of the elven gods.
I live in the moment, knowing my life could be turned upside down any day.
I appreciate beauty in all of its forms.
I hate the dark elves and the Netherese for each driving the elves out of Cormanthyr in the past.
I am a forest bumpkin who grew up in a tent in the woods and is wholly ignorant of city life.
I was raised alongside children of many other races. I harbor no racial prejudices at all.
The elves have just the right word for so many things that cannot be expressed as well in other languages. I pepper my speech with elven words, phrases, and sayings.
Patient. The elves have taught me to think and plan for the long-term. (Lawful)
Rebellious. Governments and politicians drove my family to the camps. I subtly defy authority whenever I think I can get away with it. (Chaotic)
Self - Absorbed. I've had to look out for number one so long that it has become second nature. (Any)
Wanderlust. I want to see as much of the world beyond the camps as I can. (Any)
Generous. I give everything I can to help those in need, regardless of who they are. (Good)
To the Abyss with Them. The people of Hillsfar cast me out. I won't risk my hide to help them. (Evil)
The elves took me in when I had nowhere else to go. In return, I do what I can to help elves in need.
I seek revenge against the people of Hillsfar for driving my family into the forest.
My family lost everything when they were driven from Hillsfar. I strive to rebuild that fortune.
The forest has provided me with food and shelter. In return, I protect forests and those who dwell within.
I am deeply, tragically in love with someone whose racial lifespan is far longer or shorter than mine.
Members of my extended family did not make it to the camps or have been kidnapped to fight in the Arena. I search for them tirelessly.
I am very uncomfortable indoors and underground.
I am haughty. I grew up among the elves and emulate them. Other races are crude in comparison.
Elf this, elf that. I am sick and tired of the elves.
I am a miser. Having lost everything once before, I clutch my possessions and wealth very tightly.
I am a moocher. I am so used to others providing for me that I have come to expect everyone to do it.
I believe the gods have cursed me, my family, and all of the Cormanthor refugees. We are all doomed, doomed I tell you!

items.name: Equipamiento:
items.entry: Un juego de {@item fine clothes|phb} y un {@item pouch|phb} conteniendo 5 gp

entries.name: Función: Funcionario judicial
entries: Tu conocimiento del funcionamiento de las burocracias te permite acceder a los registros y al funcionamiento interno de cualquier corte noble o gobierno que encuentres. Sabes quiénes son los que mueven los hilos, a quiénes acudir para obtener los favores que buscas y cuáles son las intrigas actuales de interés en el grupo.

entries.name: Características sugeridas
entries: Utiliza las tablas de trasfondo {@background guild artisan} del Manual del Jugador como base para tus rasgos y motivaciones, modificando las entradas cuando proceda para adaptarlas a tu identidad como cortesano.

La corte noble o la organización burocrática en la que te iniciaste está directa o indirectamente asociada a tu vínculo (que podría pertenecer a ciertos individuos del grupo, como tu patrocinador o mentor). Tu ideal podría estar relacionado con la filosofía imperante en tu corte u organización.

_.displayName: dark common clothes including a hood

items.name: Competencias en herramientas:
items.entry: Un tipo de {@filter set de juego|items|source=phb|miscellaneous=mundane|type=gaming set}, {@item thieves' tools|phb}

items.name: Equipamiento:
items.entry: A {@item crowbar|phb}, un conjunto de oscuro {@item common clothes|phb} incluyendo una capucha, y un cinturón {@item pouch|phb} que contiene 15 gp

entries.name: Reportaje: Contacto criminal
entries: Tienes un contacto fiable y de confianza que te sirve de enlace con una red de otros delincuentes. Sabes cómo hacer llegar los mensajes a tu contacto, incluso a grandes distancias; en concreto, conoces a los mensajeros locales, a los maestros de caravanas corruptos y a los marineros de mala muerte que pueden entregar los mensajes por ti.

entries.name: Especialidad
entries: Hay muchos tipos de delincuentes, y dentro de un gremio de ladrones o una organización criminal similar, los miembros individuales tienen especialidades particulares. Incluso los criminales que operan fuera de dichas organizaciones tienen fuertes preferencias por ciertos tipos de crímenes sobre otros. Elige el papel que has desempeñado en tu vida criminal, o tira en la tabla de abajo.

rows: Blackmailer
Burglar
Enforcer
Fence
Highway robber
Hired killer
Pickpocket
Smuggler

entries.name: Características sugeridas
entries: Los delincuentes pueden parecer villanos a primera vista, y muchos de ellos lo son hasta la médula. Pero algunos tienen abundantes características entrañables, si no redentoras. Puede que haya honor entre los ladrones, pero los delincuentes rara vez muestran respeto por la ley o la autoridad.

rows: I always have a plan for when things go wrong.
I am always calm, no matter what the situation. I never raise my voice or let my emotions control me.
The first thing I do in a new place is note the locations of everything valuable—or where such things could be hidden.
I would rather make a new friend than a new enemy.
I am incredibly slow to trust. Those who seem the fairest often have the most to hide.
I don't pay attention to the risks in a situation. Never tell me the odds.
The best way to get me to do something is to tell me I can't do it.
I blow up at the slightest insult.
Honor. I don't steal from others in the trade. (Lawful)
Freedom. Chains are meant to be broken, as are those who would forge them. (Chaotic)
Charity. I steal from the wealthy so that I can help people in need. (Good)
Greed. I will do whatever it takes to become wealthy. (Evil)
People. I'm loyal to my friends, not to any ideals, and everyone else can take a trip down the Styx for all I care. (Neutral)
Redemption. There's a spark of good in everyone. (Good)
I'm trying to pay off an old debt I owe to a generous benefactor.
My ill-gotten gains go to support my family.
Something important was taken from me, and I aim to steal it back.
I will become the greatest thief that ever lived.
I'm guilty of a terrible crime. I hope I can redeem myself for it.
Someone I loved died because of a mistake I made. That will never happen again.
When I see something valuable, I can't think about anything but how to steal it.
When faced with a choice between money and my friends, I usually choose the money.
If there's a plan, I'll forget it. If I don't forget it, I'll ignore it.
I have a 'tell' that reveals when I'm lying.
I turn tail and run when things look bad.
An innocent person is in prison for a crime that I committed. I'm okay with that.

background.name: Custom Background

items.name: Equipamiento:
items.entry: El paquete de equipamiento de cualquier fondo

entries.name: Característica: Elija una característica
entries: Elige una característica de cualquier fondo.

entries.name: Características sugeridas
entries: Utilice las características sugeridas de cualquier fondo.
{@note Consulte la sección sobre {@book Customizing a Background|PHB|4|Customizing a Background} en el {@book Player's Handbook|PHB} para obtener más información.}

_.special: the starting equipment of the background described in this chapter for your secondary guild

items.name: Equipamiento:
items.entry: Una insignia Dimir, tres cuchillos pequeños, un conjunto de color oscuro {@item common clothes|phb}, y el equipo inicial del trasfondo descrito en este capítulo para tu gremio secundario

entries.name: Reportaje: Falsa identidad
entries: Tienes más de una identidad. La que llevas la mayor parte del tiempo te hace parecer un miembro de un gremio distinto al de la Casa Dimir. Tienes documentación, conocidos establecidos y disfraces que te permiten asumir esa persona y encajar en el gremio secundario.
Siempre que lo desee, puede abandonar esta identidad y mezclarse con las masas sin culpa de la ciudad.
Piensa en el motivo por el que estás integrado en el gremio secundario. Crea una historia con tu DM, inspirándote en las tiradas de la siguiente tabla o eligiendo un motivo que te convenga.

rows: My parents belong to this guild, and I let them think I'm following in their footsteps.
I've been assigned to track this guild's activities.
I've been assigned to get close to an individual in this guild and learn their secrets.
I've been assigned to recruit a new Dimir spy from the ranks of this guild.
I was a member of this guild before the Dimir recruited me.
I don't like what this guild stands for and want to destroy it from within.
I secretly wish I could leave the Dimir and join this guild, but there is no escaping the Dimir.
I chose this guild at random or on a lark.

entries.name: Hechizos del Gremio Dimir
entries: {@i Prerrequisito: Hechizo o característica de clase Pacto Mágico}

Para ti, los hechizos de la tabla de Hechizos del Gremio Dimir se añaden a la lista de hechizos de tu clase de hechicero. (Si eres un personaje multiclase con varias listas de hechizos, estos hechizos se añaden a todas ellas).

entries.caption: Dimir Guild Spells
rows: Cantrip
{@spell encode thoughts|GGR}, {@spell mage hand}
1st
{@spell disguise self}, {@spell sleep}
2nd
{@spell detect thoughts}, {@spell pass without trace}
3rd
{@spell gaseous form}, {@spell meld into stone}, {@spell nondetection}
4th
{@spell arcane eye}, {@spell freedom of movement}
5th
{@spell modify memory}

entries: Tu magia está pensada para ser sutil e indetectable, pero puede atraer sombras o nubes de niebla a tu alrededor mientras lanzas tus hechizos. Con el cantrip {@spell encode thoughts|GGR} que se describe a continuación, puedes convertir los pensamientos de una criatura (incluidos los tuyos) en una cadena de pensamientos que otros pueden leer, compartir o robar. Estas hebras de pensamiento se consideran una moneda valiosa entre los Dimir.

entries.name: Características sugeridas
entries: Hábiles en la infiltración, el disfraz y el engaño, los miembros de la Casa Dimir parecen inescrutables. Es posible que su verdadera personalidad e ideales nunca se manifiesten, o que los marquen como un miembro extravagante de su gremio secundario.

entries.caption: Personality Traits
rows: I'm good at hiding my true thoughts and feelings.
When I'm in doubt about revealing something, I assume it's a secret, and I don't share it.
I like to sound mysterious, because wisdom hidden grows deeper with time.
I have no patience with people who get in my way.
I love hearing about other people's nightmares.
Combat is meant to be quick, clean, and one-sided.
I like to stick to the shadows.
I never show my anger. I just plot my revenge.

entries.caption: Ideals
rows: {@b Guild}. My true guild is all that really matters. (Any)
{@b Control}. I like pulling the strings. (Lawful)
{@b Secrets}. I collect secrets and never reveal them. (Any)
{@b Knowledge}. I want to know as much as I can about this city and how it works. (Any)
{@b Independence}. I value the freedom to pursue my own goals without interference. (Chaotic)
{@b Nihilism}. I don't believe in anything, and anyone who does is a fool. (Neutral)

entries.caption: Bonds
rows: I discovered a secret I can't let anyone else uncover—including my guild superiors.
I formed a close friendship or romance with someone in the guild I'm infiltrating.
The Dimir agent who recruited me was unmasked and killed. My revenge on the killers will be thorough and painful.
I spend as much time as I can in the Ismeri Library because I'm certain an information hub operates behind its facade. I want its secrets!
I'm utterly loyal to my superior in the guild, more than to the guild or its guildmaster.
Someone has discovered my true identity.

entries.caption: Flaws
rows: I like secrets so much that I'm reluctant to share details of a plan even with those who need to know.
I would let my friends die rather than reveal my true identity.
I have trouble trusting anyone but myself.
I have a particular vice that puts all my secrets at risk if I'm not careful.
I'm pretty sure I've done something horrible that I can't remember because of the guild's mind magic.
I put too much trust in the people who give me orders.

entries.name: Contactos
entries: Como agente de la Casa Dimir que trabaja de forma encubierta, tienes contactos limitados dentro de tu gremio. Tus relaciones dentro de tu gremio secundario, al amparo de tu falsa identidad, suelen ser más amplias.

Tira una vez en la tabla de contactos de Dimir, lo que te da un aliado que sirve de contacto en Dimir. A continuación, tira dos veces en la tabla de tu gremio secundario. La primera tirada te da un aliado allí, y la segunda te da un rival.

entries.caption: Dimir Contacts
rows: I know a Dimir courier who relays messages to me from someone higher up the chain of command.
I get orders from a shapeshifter I recognize only through a series of code phrases we exchange.
An ostentatiously wealthy vampire is my secret guild superior, summoning me to a luxurious estate by means of coded messages.
I have never met my guild contact, but I receive telepathic messages, usually in my dreams.
I've never met my guild contact, but I get coded messages from a pattern of street lights and graffiti.
I didn't discover the identity of my guild contact until after we had begun a romantic relationship.
My superior maintains an elaborate identity as a young street urchin... unless it's all a lie, and I'm being sent on ridiculous missions by a twisted child.
My sibling and I both get telepathic orders from a mysterious contact, and I'm starting to question the authenticity of my sibling's orders.

entries.name: ¿Cómo encajo?
entries: Como aventurero Dimir, eres un miembro de la red de espías, ladrones, asesinos y magos mentales del gremio que se esconde tras la fachada del gremio público. En la superficie, la Casa Dimir presenta la apariencia de una red de mensajeros, investigadores, reporteros de medios de comunicación y archivistas, que trafican con información y difunden noticias. Pero tú y tus compañeros comerciáis con secretos. Utilizáis símbolos secretos, runas y señales para comunicaros subrepticiamente con otros agentes Dimir, a menudo a la vista de todos.

Como todo buen espía, tienes múltiples identidades: tu verdadero rostro como agente de la Casa Dimir; una identidad sin gremio; y un papel como miembro de otro gremio. Dentro de ese gremio secundario, puede que ya estés en una misión para la Casa Dimir, asignada para espiar al gremio, recoger información sobre una persona o reclutar a otro espía de las filas del gremio. O ese gremio podría ser un punto de partida para tu verdadera misión. Tal vez, por ejemplo, te hayan ordenado infiltrarte en los Azorius con la esperanza de acceder a un preso notorio en una prisión de los Azorius.

_.special: small cast-off scale belonging to Vorgansharax—the Maimed Virulence

_.displayName: pouch of various coins (salvaged during your escape from Phlan)

items.name: Equipamiento:
items.entry: Un {@item dagger|phb}, harapos andrajosos, una hogaza de pan mohoso, una pequeña balanza de desecho perteneciente a Vorgansharax-la Virulencia Mutilada, y un {@item pouch|phb} con 5 gp de monedas varias (rescatadas durante tu huida de Phlan).

entries.name: Estilo de vida
entries: Miserable

entries.name: Visión general
entries: Cuando la Virulencia Mutilada descendió sobre Phlan, tú fuiste una de las desafortunadas víctimas de la guerra. Capturado durante el asalto inicial, has pasado el último año de tu vida como juguete de un caprichoso y malévolo señor.

Mientras que muchos de tus compañeros prisioneros cayeron ante la furia insaciable del dragón en los meses siguientes, tú y tus compañeros "supervivientes" sólo se salvaron de un destino peor como uno de los experimentos mágicos del dragón, dejándote a ti y a los que sobrevivieron a la tortura con cicatrices y desfigurados.

Nadie sabe qué razones tuvo el dragón para liberar a los pocos supervivientes. Sólo temes que los que murieron bajo su terrible garra fueron los afortunados, y tú y tus compañeros de Dragonscarred estáis condenados a un destino peor que la muerte.

entries.name: Origen
entries: Antes del ataque coordinado de la Virulencia mutilada y sus partidarios rebeldes del Puño Negro, eras un ciudadano o visitante de Phlan. Aunque el trauma de tu reciente experiencia ha alterado en gran medida tus motivaciones y tu percepción del mundo, tu vida anterior aún se aferra a ti y condiciona tus gestos, comportamientos y visión de la vida. Elige una entrada de la siguiente tabla (o tira al azar) para determinar tu antigua ocupación antes de tu encarcelamiento y tortura. Tu elección determina tu competencia en herramientas de este trasfondo.

rows: Dockworker/Fisherman
{@filter Vehicles (water)|items|source=phb;dmg|miscellaneous=mundane|type=vehicle (water)}
Tradesperson/Merchant
{@filter Artisan's tools|items|source=phb|miscellaneous=mundane|type=artisan's tools}
Black Fist Soldier
{@filter Gaming set|items|source=phb|miscellaneous=mundane|type=gaming set} or {@filter Vehicles (land)|items|source=phb;dmg|miscellaneous=mundane|type=vehicle (land)}
Adventurer/Visitor
{@filter Vehicles (land)|items|source=phb;dmg|miscellaneous=mundane|type=vehicle (land)}
Entertainer
{@filter Musical Instrument|items|source=phb|miscellaneous=mundane|type=instrument}
Scholar/Healer
{@item Alchemist's Supplies|phb} or {@item Herbalism kit|phb}
Criminal
{@item thieves' tools|phb}, {@item forgery kit|phb}, or {@item Disguise kit|phb}
Unskilled Laborer
{@filter Gaming set|items|source=phb|miscellaneous=mundane|type=gaming set}

entries.name: Reportaje: Dragonscarred
entries: Durante un periodo de varios meses fuiste sometido a torturas mágicas y mundanas en las garras de Vorgansharaxse y sus secuaces. Estos experimentos te han dejado horriblemente desfigurado, pero te marcan como un superviviente de la Virulencia Mutilada. Esto te proporciona cierta fama y notoriedad, ya que los que conocen tu terrible experiencia están deseando escuchar la historia personalmente, pero hace que sea difícil disimular tu aspecto y esconderte de las miradas indiscretas.

Puedes convertir esta atención en acceso a personas y lugares que de otro modo no tendrías, para ti y tus compañeros. Nobles, eruditos, magos y aquellos que buscan descubrir los secretos de la Virulencia mutilada estarían encantados de escuchar tu historia de supervivencia y aprender qué secretos (si los hay) podrías poseer, y/o estudiar tu aflicción con gran interés. Sin embargo, temes que tus aflicciones no sean completamente mundanas y que la Virulencia Mutilada pueda tener alguna razón nefasta para permitir tu huida, ya que tus cicatrices arden con furia ácida y parecen retorcerse bajo tu piel en ocasiones. Nota: Este rasgo es una variante del rasgo Viajero lejano.

entries.name: Desfiguración (opcional)
entries: Además de las cicatrices extensas, puede elegir una de las siguientes opciones para representar su desfiguración. Esta desfiguración es puramente cosmética, deformada y de aspecto horrible.

rows: Small non-functional wing(s).
Misshapen, wing-like membranes along one or both arms.
Elongated, claw-like hand(s).
Elongated, claw-like feet.
Painful green scales randomly embedded in skin.
Bulbous, reptilian eye(s).
Enlarged dorsal spines.
Hair replaced with small irregular spines.
I am driven to escape my past, and rarely stay in one place long.
I know secrets of the Maimed Virulence, but fear the harm that may befall me should others learn them.
Speaking of my ordeal helps sooth the still open wounds in my soul.
My former life is meaningless, and was ripped to shreds by the claws of Vorgansharax. All that matters now is what I do with the future.
I have faced the worst a dragon can deliver and survived. I am fearless, and my resolve unshakable.
I am haunted my tortured past, and wake at night screaming at half-remembered horrors.
I sleep with my back to a wall or tree, and a weapon within arm's reach.
I am slow to trust, but incredibly loyal to those who have earned it.
Survivor. No matter the cost, I will take any action necessary to survive. (Any)
Independence. When in trouble, the only person I can rely on is myself. (Chaotic)
Compassionate. I have suffered long at the hands of a Dragon, and take pity and compassion on the suffering of others. (Good)
Secretive. I am withdrawn, and hide my monstrous appearance for fear of drawing unwanted attention. (Chaotic)
Justice. I have been wronged, and will not allow the same fate to befall others. (Lawful)
Sycophant. During my ordeal, I became a willing servant of the Maimed Virulence, and spy on his behalf. (Evil)
I have sworn vengeance on the Maimed Virulence and those that follow him.
I long to reunite with friends and family who may dwell among the Phlan Refugees, and protect them.
While a prisoner of the Maimed Virulence, I overheard rumors of an item or treasure the Dragon seeks. I will have that treasure for myself!
I seek to reclaim and rebuild my former life to the best of my ability.
I have been reborn as a child of Vorgansharax. I will claim my birthright as his chosen heir and successor.
I attribute my survival to the work of the divine, and seek to prove myself worthy of the honor.
I have been touched with dragon-greed, and have a lust for wealth which can never be satisfied.
I secretly believe others are plotting to harm me.
I no longer enjoy the simple pleasures in life. Food is but ashes and bile in my throat.
Anyone who refuses to celebrate my celebrity does not deserve my company.
I am paranoid and overly suspicious of others. Anyone may be an agent of the Maimed Virulence.
Once I make up my mind, I follow my chosen course of action regardless of the consequences.

items.name: Equipamiento:
items.entry: Un {@item shovel|phb} o un {@item miner's pick|phb}, un {@item block and tackle|phb}, un {@item climber's kit|phb}, un conjunto de {@item common clothes|phb}, y un cinturón {@item pouch|phb} que contiene 5 gp

entries.name: Estilo de vida
entries: Pobre

entries.name: Visión general
entries: Eres un minero con mala suerte de las Montañas Espuelas de la Tierra que no es ajeno a las dificultades. Has pasado mucho tiempo viviendo entre los enanos, los goliats y los habitantes de la Infraoscuridad que también trabajan en las minas de la zona. A estas alturas, te sientes tan cómodo trabajando bajo tierra como en la superficie. Sabes cómo leer un filón, regatear para conseguir suministros con los gnomos de las profundidades, festejar con los enanos y encontrar el camino de vuelta a la superficie después. Por desgracia, no te has hecho rico... todavía. Aunque has venido a Mulmaster en busca de trabajo, las altas cumbres y las profundas minas de los Espolones de la Tierra siguen llamándote.

entries.name: Función: Minero profundo
entries: Estás acostumbrado a navegar por los lugares profundos de la tierra. Nunca te pierdes en cuevas o minas si has visto un mapa preciso de ellas o has pasado por ellas antes. Además, eres capaz de conseguir agua fresca y comida para ti y hasta cinco personas más cada día si estás en una mina o en cuevas naturales. Nota: Esta característica es una variante de la característica Outlander.

rows: Nothing bothers me for long.
I hate the horrors of the Underdark with a passion. They took my friends and family and almost got me.
Anything worth doing takes time and patience. I have learned to plan and wait for the things I want and to be patient to achieve my goals.
I can party with everyone. Whether with dwarves, or goliaths, or deep gnomes, I can find a way to have a good time.
I'd rather be mining. This is okay; mining is better.
I think that I will stumble upon great riches if I just keep looking.
People who don't work with their hands and who live in houses are soft and weak.
I wish I were more educated. I look up to people who are.
Generosity. The riches of the earth are to be shared by all. (Good)
Greed. Gems and precious metals, I want them all for myself. (Evil)
Mooch. Property, schmoperty. If I need it, I take and use it. If I don't, I leave it for someone else. (Chaotic)
Boundaries. Everything and everyone has its prescribed place; I respect that and expect others to do the same. (Lawful)
Let it Be. I don't meddle in the affairs of others if I can avoid it. They're none of my business. (Neutral)
Materialist. I want riches to improve my life. (Any)
The people of the Earthspur mines are my family. I will do anything to protect them.
A deep gnome saved my life when I was injured and alone. I owe his people a great debt.
I must behold and preserve the natural beauty of places below the earth.
Gems hold a special fascination for me, more than gold, land, magic, or power.
I want to explore new depths and scale new heights.
Someday I'm going to find the mother lode, then I'll spend the rest of my life in luxury.
I'm uncomfortable spending time under the open sky. I'd rather be indoors or underground.
I'm not used to being around other people much and sometimes get grouchy about it.
Good tools are more reliable than people. In a cave in, I would save a sturdy pick before a stranger.
I jealously guard my secrets, because I think others will take advantage of me if they learn what I know.
I am obsessed with getting rich. I always have a scheme brewing for making it big.
I'm afraid of the dark.

_.special: the favor of an admirer (love letter, lock of hair, or trinket)

items.name: Competencias en herramientas:
items.entry: {@item Disguise kit|phb}, un tipo de {@filter instrumento musical|items|source=phb|miscellaneous=mundane|type=instrument}

items.name: Equipamiento:
items.entry: Un {@filter instrumento musical|items|source=phb|miscellaneous=mundane|type=instrument} (uno de tu elección), el favor de un admirador (carta de amor, mechón de pelo o baratija), {@item costume clothes|phb}, y un cinturón {@item pouch|phb} que contiene 15 gp.

entries.name: Reportaje: A petición del público
entries: Siempre puedes encontrar un lugar para actuar, normalmente en una posada o taberna, pero posiblemente en un circo, en un teatro o incluso en la corte de un noble. En este tipo de lugares, recibes alojamiento y comida gratis de un nivel modesto o confortable (dependiendo de la calidad del establecimiento), siempre que actúes cada noche. Además, tu actuación te convierte en una especie de figura local. Cuando los forasteros te reconocen en una ciudad donde has actuado, suelen tomarte cariño.

entries.name: Especialidad
entries: Un buen animador es versátil y adereza cada actuación con una variedad de rutinas diferentes. Elige de una a tres rutinas o tira en la tabla de abajo para definir tu experiencia como animador.

rows: Actor
Dancer
Fire-eater
Jester
Juggler
Instrumentalist
Poet
Singer
Storyteller
Tumbler

entries.name: Características sugeridas
entries: Los artistas de éxito tienen que ser capaces de captar y mantener la atención del público, por lo que suelen tener personalidades extravagantes o contundentes. Se inclinan por lo romántico y a menudo se aferran a ideales elevados sobre la práctica del arte y la apreciación de la belleza.

rows: I know a story relevant to almost every situation.
Whenever I come to a new place, I collect local rumors and spread gossip.
I'm a hopeless romantic, always searching for that "special someone".
Nobody stays angry at me or around me for long, since I can defuse any amount of tension.
I love a good insult, even one directed at me.
I get bitter if I'm not the center of attention.
I'll settle for nothing less than perfection.
I change my mood or my mind as quickly as I change key in a song.
Beauty. When I perform, I make the world better than it was. (Good)
Tradition. The stories, legends, and songs of the past must never be forgotten, for they teach us who we are. (Lawful)
Creativity. The world is in need of new ideas and bold action. (Chaotic)
Greed. I'm only in it for the money and fame. (Evil)
People. I like seeing the smiles on people's faces when I perform. That's all that matters. (Neutral)
Honesty. Art should reflect the soul; it should come from within and reveal who we really are. (Any)
My instrument is my most treasured possession, and it reminds me of someone I love.
Someone stole my precious instrument, and someday I'll get it back.
I want to be famous, whatever it takes.
I idolize a hero of the old tales and measure my deeds against that person's.
I will do anything to prove myself superior to my hated rival.
I would do anything for the other members of my old troupe.
I'll do anything to win fame and renown.
I'm a sucker for a pretty face.
A scandal prevents me from ever going home again. That kind of trouble seems to follow me around.
I once satirized a noble who still wants my head. It was a mistake that I will likely repeat.
I have trouble keeping my true feelings hidden. My sharp tongue lands me in trouble.
Despite my best efforts, I am unreliable to my friends.

items.name: Equipamiento:
items.entry: {@item Disguise kit|phb}, un {@item costume clothes|phb|costume}, un {@item pouch|phb} que contiene 10 gp

entries.name: Persona sin rostro
entries: Un personaje sin rostro se aventura tras la máscara de un personaje público. Este personaje es tan natural para él como su verdadero rostro oculto, pero disfraza su identidad. Tira en la tabla de Persona Sin Rostro para determinar tu personaje, o trabaja con el DM para crear un personaje que sea único para tu personaje y se adapte al tono de tu juego.

rows: A flamboyant spy or brigand
The incarnation of a nation or people
A scoundrel with a masked guise
A vengeful spirit
The manifestation of a deity or your faith
One whose beauty is greatly accented using makeup
An impersonation of another hero
The embodiment of a school of magic
A warrior with distinctive armor
A disguise with animalistic or monstrous characteristics, meant to inspire fear

entries.name: Reportaje: Doble personalidad
entries: La mayoría de tus compañeros de aventura y el mundo te conocen como tu personaje. Aquellos que buscan saber más sobre ti -tus debilidades, tus orígenes, tu propósito- se encuentran con el obstáculo de tu disfraz. Al ponerte un disfraz y comportarte como tu personaje, no puedes identificarte como tu verdadero yo. Al quitarte el disfraz y revelar tu verdadero rostro, ya no eres identificable como tu personaje. Esto te permite cambiar de apariencia entre tus dos personalidades tan a menudo como desees, utilizando una para ocultar la otra o para servir de conveniente camuflaje. Sin embargo, si alguien se da cuenta de la conexión entre tu personaje y tu verdadero yo, tu engaño podría perder su eficacia.

entries.name: Características sugeridas
entries: Un personaje sin rostro suele interpretar a su personaje, el héroe o la persona extraordinaria que es cada día. Sin embargo, todo eso es una fachada, o una parte de ellos expresada hasta el extremo. Para definir a un personaje, siéntete libre de elegir características de otros orígenes, en particular de héroe popular, ermitaño o noble. Para la persona que está detrás del personaje, la que realmente se esfuerza por ser sin rostro, considera un conjunto distinto de características sin rostro. Como resultado, aquellos con este trasfondo tienen dos conjuntos de características, uno para su persona y otro para su yo sin rostro.

rows: I'm earnest and uncommonly direct.
I strive to have no personality—it's easier to forget what's hardly there.
I treasure a memento of the person or instance that set me upon my path.
I sleep just as much as I need to and on an unusual schedule.
I think far ahead, a detachedness often mistaken for daydreaming.
I cultivate a single obscure hobby or study and eagerly discuss it at length.
I am ever learning how to be among others—when to stay quiet, when to laugh.
I behave like an extreme opposite of my persona.
Justice. Place in society shouldn't determine one's access to what is right. (Good)
Security. Doing what must be done can't bring the innocent to harm. (Lawful)
Confusion. Deception is a weapon. Strike from where your foes won't expect. (Chaotic)
Infamy. My name will be a malediction, a curse that fulfills my will. (Evil)
Incorruptibility. Be a symbol, and leave your flawed being behind. (Any)
Anonymity. It's my deeds that should be remembered, not their instrument. (Any)
I do everything for my family. My first thought is keeping them safe.
What I do, I do for the world. The people don't realize how much they need me.
I've seen too many in need. I must not fail them as everyone else has.
I stand in opposition, lest the wicked go unopposed.
I am exceptional. I do this because no one else can, and no one can stop me.
I do everything for those who were taken from me.
I am callous about death. It comes to us all eventually.
I never make eye contact or hold it unflinchingly.
I have no sense of humor. Laughing is uncomfortable and embarrassing.
I overexert myself, sometimes needing to recuperate for a day or more.
I think far ahead, a detachedness often mistaken for daydreaming.
I see morality entirely in black and white.

_.special: Badge or emblem of your faction
copy of a seminal faction text (or code-book for a covert faction)

items.name: Habilidades:
items.entry: {@skill Insight} y una habilidad de Inteligencia, Sabiduría o Carisma de tu elección, según corresponda a tu facción.

items.name: Equipamiento:
items.entry: Insignia o emblema de tu facción, una copia de un texto seminal de la facción (o libro de códigos para una facción encubierta), un conjunto de {@item common clothes|phb}, y un {@item pouch|phb} que contiene 15 gp.

entries.name: Reportaje: Refugio seguro
entries: Como agente de la facción, tienes acceso a una red secreta de seguidores y agentes que pueden proporcionarte ayuda en tus aventuras. Conoces un conjunto de signos y contraseñas secretas que puedes utilizar para identificar a estos agentes, que pueden proporcionarte acceso a un piso franco oculto, alojamiento y comida gratis o ayuda para encontrar información. Estos agentes nunca arriesgan su vida por ti ni se arriesgan a revelar su verdadera identidad.

entries.name: Características sugeridas
entries: Utiliza las tablas de trasfondo {@background acolyte} del Manual del Jugador como base para tus rasgos y motivaciones, modificando las entradas cuando proceda para adaptarlas a tu identidad como agente de facción. (Por ejemplo, considera que las palabras "fe" y "facción" son intercambiables).

Tu vínculo puede estar asociado a otros miembros de tu facción, o a un lugar u objeto que sea importante para tu facción. El ideal por el que luchas probablemente esté en consonancia con los principios de tu facción, pero podría ser de naturaleza más personal.

items.name: Competencias en herramientas:
items.entry: Un tipo de {@filter herramientas del artesano|items|source=phb|miscellaneous=mundane|type=artisan's tools}

items.name: Equipamiento:
items.entry: Un juego de {@filter herramientas del artesano|items|source=phb|miscellaneous=mundane|type=artisan's tools}, {@item merchant's scale|phb}, un juego de {@item fine clothes|phb}, y un cinturón {@item pouch|phb} que contiene 10 gp

entries.name: Reportaje: Cadena de suministro
entries: De su tiempo como comerciante, conserva conexiones con mayoristas, proveedores y otros comerciantes y empresarios. Puede recurrir a estas conexiones cuando busque artículos o información.

entries.name: Características sugeridas
entries: Ser comerciante implicaba tener cabeza para los números, una fuerte personalidad, la capacidad de hacer tratos con adversarios hostiles, un fuerte brazo armado para luchar contra los bandidos y la intuición para saber lo que la gente quiere y necesita. El arte de los negocios es el arte de encontrar el mejor camino para obtener beneficios, y ese camino puede ser diferente en cada transacción. Se necesita una mente fuerte y un estómago más fuerte para tener éxito. Entonces, ¿por qué ha fracasado?

rows: I didn't have the cutthroat attitude necessary to succeed. I won't make that mistake again.
Even my competitors said I was affable and talented. Those traits should serve me well.
To prosper, you have to be in control.
The customer is always right.
I was cutting corners and breaking deals to maximize profit. That's why I failed.
When I get an idea, I am single-minded in its execution—even if it's a terrible idea.
If I can be everyone's friend, I'll always have support.
My heart wasn't in being a merchant, so I failed. I'm not all that keen on adventuring either, but I need the money.
Survival. Where there's life, there's hope. If I remain alive and flexible, I can succeed. (Any)
Generosity. People helped me when I was down. Now that I'm back on my feet, I'll pay it forward. (Good)
Excitement. Caution got me nowhere in my previous business. I'm not going to let it hold me back now. (Chaotic)
Wealth. With enough coin, I can buy comfort, power, knowledge, and even eternal life. Nothing will stand between me and money. (Evil)
Stability. The mercantile trade was too chaotic for me. I need a nice stable profession, like adventuring. (Lawful)
Redemption. Too many people consider me a failure. So I need to prove them wrong. (Any)
My family means everything to me. I failed them before, and I must not do so again.
My church provides a connection to my god, so I must ensure that it is protected and funded.
My former business partner fell ill, and then our business failed. Part of my new venture involves earning enough to take care of their family.
If I take care of my possessions, they'll take care of me. People come and go, but a weapon or a wand is something you can always rely on.
Although my business failed, the people of my community were kind to me. I'll do everything in my power to protect them.
I owe a dangerous person a lot of money. As long as they're happy, they let my debt rest unpaid.
Why spend gold here when you can buy the same thing for copper in the next town?
I must have the best of everything. Like, right now.
You haven't heard of me? I'm sure that's because of your ignorance and low breeding.
I failed, but I'm awesome. So when anyone else is successful, it must be because of nepotism, dishonesty, or dumb luck.
I find that most people are trustworthy. Hey, where's my belt pouch?
Nothing gets between me and danger except my fellow adventurers. So I'll be sure to put them there.

_.special: poorly wrought maps from your homeland that depict where you are in Faerûn
small piece of jewelry in the style of your homeland's craftsmanship

items.name: Competencias en herramientas:
items.entry: Cualquiera {@filter instrumento musical|items|source=phb|miscellaneous=mundane|type=instrument} o {@filter set de juego|items|source=phb|miscellaneous=mundane|type=gaming set} de su elección, probablemente algo autóctono de su tierra natal

items.name: Equipamiento:
items.entry: Un juego de {@item traveler's clothes|phb}, cualquiera de {@filter instrumento musical|items|source=phb|miscellaneous=mundane|type=instrument} o {@filter set de juego|items|source=phb|miscellaneous=mundane|type=gaming set} que domines, mapas de tu patria pobremente labrados que indiquen dónde te encuentras en Faerûn, una pequeña joya por valor de 10 gp del estilo de la artesanía de tu patria, y un {@item pouch|phb} que contenga 5 gp.

entries.name: Reportaje: Todos los ojos puestos en ti
entries: Su acento, sus gestos, sus expresiones y quizás incluso su aspecto le hacen parecer extranjero. Por donde quiera que vayas, te dirigen miradas curiosas, lo que puede resultar molesto, pero también te ganas el interés amistoso de los eruditos y otros intrigados por las tierras lejanas, por no hablar de la gente corriente que está deseosa de escuchar historias de tu tierra natal.

Puedes convertir esta atención en acceso a personas y lugares que de otra manera no tendrías, para ti y tus compañeros de viaje. Los señores nobles, los eruditos y los príncipes mercaderes, por nombrar algunos, podrían estar interesados en conocer tu lejana patria y tu gente.

entries.name: ¿Por qué está aquí?
entries: Un viajero lejano puede haber emprendido un viaje por una de varias razones, y la salida de su tierra natal puede haber sido voluntaria o involuntaria. Para determinar por qué está tan lejos de su hogar, tira en la tabla de abajo o elige entre las opciones que se ofrecen. En la sección siguiente, en la que se habla de las posibles patrias, se sugieren algunas razones adecuadas para cada lugar.

rows: Emissary
Exile
Fugitive
Pilgrim
Sightseer
Wanderer
I have different assumptions from those around me concerning personal space, blithely invading others' space in innocence, or reacting to ignorant invasion of my own.
I have my own ideas about what is and is not food, and I find the eating habits of those around me fascinating, confusing, or revolting.
I have a strong code of honor or sense of propriety that others don't comprehend.
I express affection or contempt in ways that are unfamiliar to others.
I honor my deities through practices that are foreign to this land.
I begin or end my day with small traditional rituals that are unfamiliar to those around me.
Open. I have much to learn from the kindly folk I meet along my way. (Good)
Reserved. As someone new to these strange lands, I am cautious and respectful in my dealings. (Lawful)
Adventure. I'm far from home, and everything is strange and wonderful! (Chaotic)
Cunning. Though I may not know their ways, neither do they know mine, which can be to my advantage. (Evil)
Inquisitive. Everything is new, but I have a thirst to learn. (Neutral)
Suspicious. I must be careful, for I have no way of telling friend from foe here. (Any)
So long as I have this token from my homeland, I can face any adversity in this strange land.
The gods of my people are a comfort to me so far away from home.
I hold no greater cause than my service to my people.
My freedom is my most precious possession. I'll never let anyone take it from me again.
I'm fascinated by the beauty and wonder of this new land.
Though I had no choice, I lament having to leave my loved one(s) behind. I hope to see them again one day.
I am secretly (or not so secretly) convinced of the superiority of my own culture over that of this foreign land.
I pretend not to understand the local language in order to avoid interactions I would rather not have.
I have a weakness for the new intoxicants and other pleasures of this land.
I don't take kindly to some of the actions and motivations of the people of this land, because these folks are different from me.
I consider the adherents of other gods to be deluded innocents at best, or ignorant fools at worst.
I have a weakness for the exotic beauty of the people of these lands.

items.name: Idiomas:
items.entry: Uno a elegir entre {@language Elvish}, {@language Gnomish}, {@language Goblin} o {@language Sylvan}

items.name: Equipamiento:
items.entry: Un {@filter instrumento musical|items|source=phb|miscellaneous=mundane|type=instrument} (uno de tu elección), un {@item Traveler's Clothes|PHB|set of traveler's clothes}, tres baratijas (cada una determinada tirando en la tabla del {@item Feywild Trinket|WBtW|Feywild Trinkets}), y un {@item pouch|phb} que contiene 8 gp.

entries.name: Reportaje: Conexión Feywild
entries: Los nativos del Feywild reconocen tus modales y tu conocimiento de las costumbres fey, y te ven como uno de los suyos. Por ello, las criaturas fey amistosas tienden a acudir en tu ayuda si te pierdes o necesitas ayuda en el Feywild.

entries.name: Fey Mark
entries: Tu estancia en el Feywild te ha transformado de alguna manera y has obtenido una marca fey, que se determina tirando en la tabla de marcas fey.

entries.caption: Fey Mark
rows: Your eyes swirl with iridescent colors.
You have a sweet scent, like that of nectar or honey.
You have long whiskers like those of a cat.
Your ears are covered with soft tufts of fur.
Your skin sparkles in moonlight.
Flowers either bloom or wilt (your choice) in your presence.
Your hair is made of vines or brambles and grows back to normal length within 1 hour of being cut.
You have a tail like that of a dog or another animal.

entries.name: Visitante de Feywild
entries: Siempre que estés profundamente dormido o en trance durante un largo descanso, un espíritu del Feywild podría hacerte una visita, si el DM lo desea. Determina la forma del espíritu tirando en la tabla de Visitantes del Feywild. Estas visitas, que pueden durar minutos u horas, no te causan nunca ningún daño, y recuerdas cada visita cuando te despiertas. Las conversaciones que se producen con un visitante pueden contener cualquier cantidad de cosas, desde mensajes y conocimientos hasta tonterías y pistas falsas, a discreción del DM. Dichas conversaciones siempre se llevan a cabo en un idioma que puedas entender, incluso si el visitante del Feywild no puede hablar ese idioma normalmente.

entries.caption: Feywild Visitor
rows: Awakened creature (a Beast or an ordinary plant that has had the {@spell awaken} spell cast on it)
{@creature Centaur}
{@creature Dryad}
{@creature Faerie Dragon (Violet)||Faerie dragon}
{@creature Pixie}
{@creature Satyr}
{@creature Sprite}
{@creature Unicorn}

entries.name: Rasgos de carácter
entries: A medida que los jugadores eligen el trasfondo de sus personajes, pueden utilizar las siguientes tablas para ayudarles a determinar los rasgos de personalidad, los ideales, los vínculos y los defectos de sus personajes. Los jugadores pueden utilizar estas tablas en lugar de las que aparecen en el {@book Player's Handbook|PHB}, o pueden mezclarlas y combinarlas. Si un resultado obtenido no tiene sentido para un personaje, el jugador puede volver a tirar o elegir una entrada más apropiada en la tabla.
Estas tablas, aunque son opcionales, se adaptan bien a las aventuras con temática Feywild y son ideales para cualquier personaje que tenga el trasfondo de feylost o mano de bruja.

entries.caption: Personality Traits
rows: I'm haunted by fey laughter that only I can hear, though I know it's just my mind playing tricks on me.
Like a nomad, I can't settle down in one place for very long.
Good music makes me weep like a baby.
Wherever I go, I try to bring a little of the warmth and tranquility of home with me.
I have never lost my childlike sense of wonder.
When I have a new idea, I get wildly excited about it until I come up with another, better idea.
I live by my own set of weird and wonderful rules.
I can't bring myself to trust most adults.

entries.caption: Ideals
rows: Friendship. I never leave a friend behind. (Good)
Empathy. No creature should be made to suffer. (Good)
Wanderlust. I prefer to take the less traveled path. (Chaotic)
Changeability. Change is good, which is why I live by an ever-changing set of rules. (Chaotic)
Honor. A deal is a deal, and I would never break one. (Lawful)
Rule of Three. Everything in the multiverse happens in threes. I see the "rule of three" everywhere. (Lawful)
Obsession. I won't let go of a grudge. (Evil)
Greed. I will do whatever it takes to get what I want, regardless of the harm it might cause. (Evil)

entries.caption: Bonds
rows: I would never break my word.
I find magic in all its forms to be compelling. The more magical a place, the more I am drawn to it.
I do what I can to protect the natural world.
A trusted friend is the most important thing in the multiverse to me.
I can't bring myself to harm a Fey creature, either because I consider myself one or because I fear the repercussions.
The Witchlight Carnival feels like home to me.
I'm drawn to the Feywild and long to return there, if only for a short while.
I feel indebted to {@creature Mister Witch|WBtW} and {@creature Mister Light|WBtW} for giving me a home and a purpose.

entries.caption: Flaws
rows: I easily lose track of time. My poor sense of time means I'm always late.
I think the whole multiverse is out to get me.
I'm always operating under a tight timeline, and I'm obsessed with keeping everything on schedule.
I'm a kleptomaniac who covets shiny, sparkling treasure.
I'm forgetful. Sometimes I can't remember even the simplest things.
I never give away anything for free and always expect something in return.
I have many vices and tend to indulge them.
I'm always changing my mind—well, almost always.

items.name: Equipamiento:
items.entry: {@item Fishing tackle|phb}, un {@item net|phb}, un señuelo de pesca favorito o botas de vadeo de cuero engrasado, un juego de {@item traveler's clothes|phb}, y un cinturón {@item pouch|phb} que contiene 10 gp

entries.name: Reportaje: Cosechar el agua
entries: Obtienes ventaja en los chequeos de habilidad realizados con los aparejos de pesca. Si tienes acceso a una masa de agua que sustente la vida marina, puedes mantener un estilo de vida moderado mientras trabajas como pescador, y puedes capturar suficiente comida para alimentarte a ti y a otras diez personas cada día.

entries.name: Cuento de pesca
entries: Puedes contar una historia convincente, ya sea falsa o verdadera, para impresionar y entretener a los demás. Una vez al día, puedes contar tu historia a los oyentes que lo deseen. A discreción del DM, algunos de esos oyentes se vuelven amistosos contigo; esto no es un efecto mágico, y la continuidad de la amabilidad por su parte depende de tus acciones. Puedes hacer una tirada en la siguiente tabla para ayudar a determinar el tema de tu cuento o elegir el que mejor se adapte a tu personaje. Alternativamente, trabaja con tu DM para crear tu propio cuento de pesca.

rows: Lobster Wrestling. You fought in hand-to-hand combat with an immense lobster.
It Dragged the Boat. You nearly caught a fish of monstrous size that pulled your boat for miles.
Fins of Pure Gold. You caught a sea animal whose fins were made of pure gold, but another fisher stole it.
Ghost Fish. You are haunted by a ghostly fish that only you can see.
Nemesis Clam. A large clam containing a pearl the size of your head claimed one of your fingers before jetting away; one day, you'll find that clam.
It Swallowed the Sun. You once saw a fish leap from the water and turn day into night.
Dive into the Abyss. You found yourself in an underwater cave leading to the Abyss, and your luck has been sour ever since.
Love Story. You fell in love with a creature of pure water, but your brief romance ended tragically.

entries.name: Características sugeridas
entries: Los pescadores sólo tienen éxito si dedican tiempo a su trabajo. Por ello, la mayoría de los pescadores tienen una fuerte ética de trabajo y admiran a los que se ganan la vida honestamente. Los pescadores tienden a ser supersticiosos y se apegan a determinados señuelos o lugares de pesca. Tienen una conexión con las masas de agua en las que pescan y tienen mala opinión de aquellos cuyas acciones afectan negativamente a su medio de vida.

entries.caption: Fisher Personality Traits
rows: I am unmoved by the wrath of nature.
My friends are my crew; we sink or float together.
I need long stretches of quiet to clear my head.
Rich folk don't know the satisfaction of hard work.
I laugh heartily, feel deeply, and fear nothing.
I work hard; nature offers no handouts.
I dislike bargaining; state your price and mean it.
Luck favors me, and I take risks others might not.

entries.caption: Fisher Ideals
rows: {@b Camaraderie.} Good people make even the longest voyage bearable. (Good)
{@b Luck.} Our luck depends on respecting its rules—now throw this salt over your shoulder. (Lawful)
{@b Daring.} The richest bounty goes to those who risk everything. (Chaotic)
{@b Plunder.} Take all that you can and leave nothing for the scavengers. (Evil)
{@b Balance.} Do not fish the same spot twice in a row; suppress your greed, and nature will reward you. (Neutral)
{@b Hard Work.} No wave can move a soul hard at work. (Any)

entries.caption: Fisher Bonds
rows: I lost something important in the deep sea, and I intend to find it.
Someone else's greed destroyed my livelihood, and I will be compensated.
I will fish the many famous waters of this land.
The gods saved me during a terrible storm, and I will honor their gift.
My destiny awaits me at the bottom of a particular pond in the Feywild.
I must repay my village's debt.

entries.caption: Fisher Flaws
rows: I am judgmental, especially of those I deem homebodies or otherwise lazy.
I become depressed and anxious if I'm away from the sea too long.
I have lived a hard life and find it difficult to empathize with others.
I am inclined to tell long-winded stories at inopportune times.
I work hard, but I play harder.
I am obsessed with catching an elusive aquatic beast, often to the detriment of other pursuits.

items.name: Competencias en herramientas:
items.entry: Un tipo de {@filter herramientas del artesano|items|source=phb|miscellaneous=mundane|type=artisan's tools}, {@filter vehículos (terrestres)|items|source=phb;dmg|miscellaneous=mundane|type=vehicle (land)}

items.name: Equipamiento:
items.entry: Un conjunto de {@filter herramientas del artesano|items|source=phb|miscellaneous=mundane|type=artisan's tools} (uno de su elección), un {@item shovel|phb}, un {@item iron pot|phb}, un conjunto de {@item common clothes|phb}, y un cinturón {@item pouch|phb} que contiene 10 gp

entries.name: Reportaje: Hospitalidad rústica
entries: Como procedes de las filas del pueblo llano, te adaptas a él con facilidad. Puedes encontrar un lugar para esconderte, descansar o recuperarte entre otros plebeyos, a menos que hayas demostrado ser un peligro para ellos. Te protegerán de la ley o de cualquiera que te busque, aunque no arriesgarán sus vidas por ti.

entries.name: Especialidad
entries: Antes ejercías una profesión sencilla entre el campesinado, quizá como agricultor, minero, sirviente, pastor, leñador o sepulturero. Pero algo sucedió que te puso en un camino diferente y te marcó para cosas más grandes. Escoge o determina al azar un acontecimiento determinante que te haya marcado como héroe del pueblo.

rows: I stood up to a tyrant's agents.
I saved people during a natural disaster.
I stood alone against a terrible monster.
I stole from a corrupt merchant to help the poor.
I led a militia to fight off an invading army.
I broke into a tyrant's castle and stole weapons to arm the people.
I trained the peasantry to use farming implements as weapons against a tyrant's soldiers.
A lord rescinded an unpopular decree after I led a symbolic act of protest against it.
A celestial, fey, or similar creature gave me a blessing or revealed my secret origin.
Recruited into a lord's army, I rose to leadership and was commended for my heroism.

entries.name: Características sugeridas
entries: Un héroe popular es uno de los ciudadanos de a pie, para bien o para mal. La mayoría de los héroes populares consideran su origen humilde como una virtud, no como un defecto, y sus comunidades de origen siguen siendo muy importantes para ellos.

rows: I judge people by their actions, not their words.
If someone is in trouble, I'm always ready to lend help.
When I set my mind to something, I follow through no matter what gets in my way.
I have a strong sense of fair play and always try to find the most equitable solution to arguments.
I'm confident in my own abilities and do what I can to instill confidence in others.
Thinking is for other people. I prefer action.
I misuse long words in an attempt to sound smarter.
I get bored easily. When am I going to get on with my destiny?
Respect. People deserve to be treated with dignity and respect. (Good)
Fairness. No one should get preferential treatment before the law, and no one is above the law. (Lawful)
Freedom. Tyrants must not be allowed to oppress the people. (Chaotic)
Might. If I become strong, I can take what I want—what I deserve. (Evil)
Sincerity. There's no good in pretending to be something I'm not. (Neutral)
Destiny. Nothing and no one can steer me away from my higher calling. (Any)
I have a family, but I have no idea where they are. One day, I hope to see them again.
I worked the land, I love the land, and I will protect the land.
A proud noble once gave me a horrible beating, and I will take my revenge on any bully I encounter.
My tools are symbols of my past life, and I carry them so that I will never forget my roots.
I protect those who cannot protect themselves.
I wish my childhood sweetheart had come with me to pursue my destiny.
The tyrant who rules my land will stop at nothing to see me killed.
I'm convinced of the significance of my destiny, and blind to my shortcomings and the risk of failure.
The people who knew me when I was young know my shameful secret, so I can never go home again.
I have a weakness for the vices of the city, especially hard drink.
Secretly, I believe that things would be better if I were a tyrant lording over the land.
I have trouble trusting in my allies.

items.name: Equipamiento:
items.entry: Un {@filter set de juego|items|source=phb|miscellaneous=mundane|type=gaming set}, un amuleto de la suerte, un juego de {@item fine clothes|phb}, y un cinturón {@item pouch|phb} que contiene 15 gp

entries.name: Reportaje: Nunca me cuentes las probabilidades
entries: Las probabilidades y los pronósticos son el pan de cada día. Durante las actividades de tiempo de inactividad que implican juegos de azar o calcular las probabilidades del mejor plan, puedes tener un sentido sólido de qué opción es probablemente la mejor y qué oportunidades parecen demasiado buenas para ser verdad, a determinación del DM.

entries.name: Características sugeridas
entries: Algunos apuestan por necesidad. Otros lo hacen por aburrimiento. Y otros se vuelven adictos a la emoción de ganar o perderlo todo en un giro de la fortuna. Para algunos, el juego es menos una cuestión de azar y más una cuestión de buscar cualquier ventaja para asegurar el resultado. Los mejores jugadores pueden perderlo todo, y los peores jugadores a veces ganan. En cualquier caso, siempre se puede distinguir a los jugadores por su mirada. La suerte les persigue.

rows: I plan for every contingency. Leave nothing to chance!
Every copper wants to be a silver. Each bet is an opportunity.
I'm one of Lady Luck's favored. Anything I try is destined to succeed.
I've lost so much to gambling that I refuse to spend money on anything anymore.
Nothing is certain. Planning is a coward's act.
I can't be sure who I've swindled, cheated, or defeated, so I keep a low profile in public.
The perfect bet is out there somewhere. I just have to keep my eyes open.
I have beaten my addiction, but all it takes is one weak moment and I'll be back at the card table.
Knowledge. Knowledge is power, and knowing which horse to back is the key to success. (Any)
Fate. Whatever happens is fated, regardless of any planning or striving. (Lawful)
Bravery. If you want to succeed, you have to take risks. (Chaotic)
Survival. You can't win if you're dead. Live to fight another day—when the odds might be more in your favor. (Any)
Reliability. When I was in need, I was able to rely on others. Now I want to be the one others rely on. (Good)
Victory. Winning is the real measure of a person. In the end, the only thing that matters is the scoreboard. (Evil)
One person in particular owes me a lot of money, and I need to keep them alive if I want to be repaid.
I'm loyal to the friend or family member who taught me how to gamble.
The person who saved me from my gambling addiction is the only reason I'm alive today.
A patron once fronted me money in exchange for a percentage of my winnings. I owe them a debt of gratitude. And a lot of cash.
A criminal syndicate I once played for isn't happy I left the game, and its enforcers are looking for me.
Urchins once helped me find marks for my games. Now I'm driven to help them escape the streets.
I don't know when to quit. Especially when everyone else is telling me to.
I save my sympathy for my friends, and I have no friends.
You think we're in trouble now? Let me tell you how bad things are likely to get!
You can loan me a little, right? I've got a sure thing. I'll double your money, guaranteed.
I was once a terribly flawed person, like you. Let me tell you how you can save yourself.
I'm a great gambler. I'm just bad at math and logic.

items.name: Competencias en herramientas:
items.entry: {@item Thieves' tools|phb}, un tipo de {@filter instrumento musical|items|source=phb|miscellaneous=mundane|type=instrument}

items.name: Equipamiento:
items.entry: Una caja de limosnas maltrecha, un {@filter instrumento musical|items|source=phb|miscellaneous=mundane|type=instrument}, una chaqueta, gorra o bufanda militar desechada, un juego de {@item common clothes|phb}, un cinturón {@item pouch|phb} y 10 gp.

entries.name: Estilo de vida
entries: Pobre

entries.name: Visión general
entries: Todo el tráfico que entra y sale de la Ciudad del Comercio pasa por la Puerta de Hillsfar, lo que la convierte en el lugar ideal para que los indigentes se reúnan para mendigar, vender, cotillear y robar. Creciste en las calles a la sombra de ese gran edificio de acero, que alberga tanto a los Plumas Rojas como a los Magos del Gremio. Aunque te hayas ido, todavía tienes amigos entre ellos, y esa vida ha tenido un impacto duradero en ti.

entries.name: Artículo: Pluma Roja y Contactos del Gremio de Magos
entries: Hiciste varios amigos entre los Plumas Rojas y el Gremio de Magos cuando vivías en la Puerta de Hillsfar. Te recuerdan con cariño y te ayudan en pequeñas cosas cuando pueden. Puedes invocar su ayuda en Hillsfar y sus alrededores para obtener alimentos, así como equipo sencillo de uso temporal. También puedes invocarla para acceder a las zonas de baja seguridad de sus guarniciones, salones y campamentos. Nota: Este rasgo es una variante del rasgo Soldado.

rows: I appreciate the simple things in life. a song, a warm meal, a sunny day. I don't need any more.
My problems are always caused by others. I'm never to blame.
I am afraid I could wind up back on the streets any day.
I get along with everyone.
I see people as marks for a con and have difficulty feeling true empathy for them.
I have a real flair for matchmaking. I can find anyone a spouse!
I think money is the true measure of appreciation and affection. Everything else is talk or an act.
I don't like having a lot of stuff, just a few simple things I need. I don't like being tied down and tend to leave things behind when I don't need them anymore.
Loyal. I never rat out any of my friends, even when the Red Plumes or the Rogues Guild ask. (Lawful)
Adventurous. I don't like doing the same thing every day. I crave variety. (Chaotic)
Strong. Only the strong survive. I respect those who are strong and powerful. (Any)
Witty. Brains are better than brawn. I rely on my wits and respect others who do the same. (Any)
Honest. Others can do what they want, but I won't lie or steal, even to feed my family. (Good)
Ungrateful. Those who give, only do it to make themselves feel better. I steal from them. (Evil)
The Joydancers of Lliira gave me my instrument when I really needed food. I hate them for that.
Busking has taught me to love music above all else.
The Rogues Guild spared me when I did a job without cutting them in. I owe them a great debt.
I know people hate the Red Plumes, but some of them were really good to me. I help Red Plumes whenever I can, and I respect them. They're just doing what they have to do to get by in this world.
I will be wealthy some day. My descendants will live in comfort and style.
I know how hard life on the streets is. I do everything I can for those who have less than me.
Though I no longer live at the Gate, I am still always concerned about where I will get my next meal.
Years of thieving have become habit. I sometimes steal from strangers without thinking about it.
I am ashamed of my origins. I pretend I am higher-born and fear others will find out the truth.
I think people who grew up in houses are soft, spoiled, and ungrateful. I frequently tell them so.
I am still very uncomfortable wearing nice clothes, sleeping in a warm bed, and eating fine food.
I do not trust anyone who has not had a hard life.

_.special: ring of keys to unknown locks

items.name: Idiomas:
items.entry: Dos de tu elección (se recomiendan Abisal, Celestial o Infernal)

items.name: Equipamiento:
items.entry: Un anillo de llaves para cerraduras desconocidas, un {@item book|PHB} en blanco, un {@item ink pen|PHB} o pluma, una botella de tinta negra, un juego de {@item traveler's clothes|PHB}, y un {@item pouch|PHB} que contiene 10 gp

entries.name: Función: Infusión planar
entries: Vivir en una ciudad-puerta o en un lugar similar te empapa de energía planar. Obtienes la proeza {@feat Scion of the Outer Planes|SatO}. Además, sabes dónde encontrar alojamiento y comida modestos y gratuitos en la comunidad en la que creciste.

entries.name: Características sugeridas
entries: La influencia de un Plano Exterior moldea tu perspectiva. La tabla de Rasgos de Personalidad del Guardián de la Puerta sugiere rasgos que podrías adoptar para tu personaje.

rows: Strange events and otherworldly creatures don't faze me.
I think in terms of exchange: something for something, nothing for nothing.
I speak with an unusual cadence.
I pepper my speech with words or curses borrowed from planar languages.
I've seen enough to know that you can't take anyone at face value, so I scrutinize everyone.
I have a superstitious habit I picked up from my gate-town, such as touching iron when I'm nervous or arranging objects in a specific order.

entries.name: Construir un personaje de guardián de la puerta
entries: Quienes habitan durante un tiempo prolongado cerca de un portal permanente a otro plano absorben la esencia que irradia el reino del más allá. Los que están influidos por el mismo plano comparten similitudes de comportamiento e incluso de aspecto físico.

entries.name: Baratijas del guardián de la puerta
entries: Cuando creas tu personaje, puedes tirar una vez en la tabla {@item Gate Warden Trinket|SatO|Gate Warden Trinkets}, en vez de en la tabla {@item Trinket|PHB|Trinkets} del Manual del Jugador, para tu baratija inicial.

a.special: small stone that reminds you of home

b.special: sprig that reminds you of home

items.name: Idiomas:
items.entry: Gigante y otro idioma de su elección

items.name: Equipamiento:
items.entry: Un {@item backpack|phb}, un juego de {@item traveler's clothes|phb}, una pequeña piedra o ramita que te recuerde a tu hogar, y un {@item pouch|phb} que contiene 10 gp.

entries.name: Historias de origen
entries: Cómo llegaste a vivir entre criaturas colosales es algo que debes determinar, pero la tabla de Origen de los Expósitos sugiere una variedad de posibilidades.

entries.caption: Foundling Origin
rows: You were found as a baby by a family of nomadic giants who raised you as one of their own.
A family of stone giants rescued you when you fell into a mountain chasm, and you have lived with them underground ever since.
You were lost or abandoned as a child in a jungle that teemed with ravenous dinosaurs. There, you found an equally lost frost giant; together, you survived.
Your farm was crushed and your family killed in a battle between warring groups of giants. Racked with guilt over the destruction, a sympathetic giant soldier promised to care for you.
After you had a series of strange dreams as a child, your superstitious parents sent you to study with a powerful but aloof storm giant oracle.
While playing hide-and-seek with your friends, you stumbled into the castle of a cloud giant, who immediately adopted you.

entries.name: Construir un personaje de expósito gigante
entries: Tu vida entre gigantes te ha dado una perspectiva única. Aunque eres inusualmente grande para tu especie, no eres más grande que un niño gigante, por lo que podrías ser muy consciente de tu tamaño.

entries.name: Reportaje: Huelga de gigantes
entries: Ganas la proeza {@feat Strike of the Giants|BGG}.

entries.name: Características sugeridas
entries: La tabla de Rasgos de Personalidad de Expósito Gigante sugiere una variedad de rasgos que podrías adoptar para tu personaje.

rows: What I lack in stature compared to giants, I make up for with sheer spite.
I insist on being taken seriously as a full-grown adult. Nobody talks down to me!
Crowded spaces make me uncomfortable. I'd much rather be in an open field than a bustling tavern.
I embrace my shorter stature. It helps me stay unnoticed—and underestimated.
Every avalanche begins as a single pebble.
The world always feels too big, and I'm afraid I'll never find my place in it.

items.name: Idiomas:
items.entry: Elige uno de los elfos, gigantes o kraul

items.name: Equipamiento:
items.entry: Una insignia Golgari, un {@item poisoner's kit|phb}, un escarabajo o araña mascota, un conjunto de {@item common clothes|phb}, y un cinturón {@item pouch|phb} que contiene 10 gp de monedas mezcladas.

entries.name: Reportaje: Caminos subterráneos
entries: Conoces caminos ocultos y subterráneos que puedes utilizar para evitar las multitudes, los obstáculos y la observación mientras te mueves por la ciudad. Cuando no estás en combate, tú y tus compañeros pueden viajar entre dos lugares cualquiera de la ciudad el doble de rápido de lo que normalmente permitiría tu velocidad. Los caminos de la ciudad subterránea están acechados por peligros que rara vez se atreven a la luz del mundo de la superficie, por lo que no está garantizado que tu viaje sea seguro.

entries.name: Hechizos del Gremio Golgari
entries: {@i Prerrequisito: Hechizo o característica de clase Pacto Mágico}

Para ti, los hechizos de la tabla de Hechizos del Gremio Golgari se añaden a la lista de hechizos de tu clase de hechicero. (Si eres un personaje multiclase con varias listas de hechizos, estos hechizos se añaden a todas ellas).

entries.caption: Golgari Guild Spells
rows: Cantrip
{@spell dancing lights}, {@spell spare the dying}
1st
{@spell entangle}, {@spell ray of sickness}
2nd
{@spell protection from poison}, {@spell ray of enfeeblement}, {@spell spider climb}
3rd
{@spell animate dead}, {@spell plant growth}
4th
{@spell giant insect}, {@spell grasping vine}
5th
{@spell cloudkill}, {@spell insect plague}

entries: La magia de Golgari suele ir acompañada de un resplandor verde enfermizo y un hedor putrefacto.

entries.name: Características sugeridas
entries: Los miembros del Enjambre Golgari son inequívocamente productos de la subciudad, que no se sienten a gusto en medio de las comodidades de la civilización. Provocan el mismo malestar en los demás al recordarles la inevitable proximidad de la muerte.

entries.caption: Personality Traits
rows: Remember, I could kill you in your sleep. Or put centipedes in your bedroll.
I like to remind people of their inevitable demise.
Sometimes I give voice to the whispers of the rot, which I hear but no one else does.
I do my best to discourage anyone from approaching or talking to me.
I have accepted my death. Hence, I don't fear it.
Like roots growing through stone, I am relentless and determined in my action.
I put my knowledge of anatomy to use by narrating the injuries my enemies suffer in grisly detail.
Like a wild animal, I lash out viciously when I'm provoked—and I'm easily provoked.

entries.caption: Ideals
rows: {@b Guild}. My guild is all that really matters. (Any)
{@b Stoicism}. All of us are part of the cyclical march of nature, which will continue with or without us. (Neutral)
{@b Nature}. The natural world is more important than the edifices of the city and civilization. (Neutral)
{@b Interdependence}. We are all part of nature's web. (Lawful)
{@b Ambition}. The time of Golgari ascendance is at hand, and I intend to have a prominent place in the new world order. (Evil)
{@b Live and Let Live}. Meddling in the affairs of other guilds is a great way to get squashed like a bug. (Neutral)

entries.caption: Bonds
rows: I cherish the finger of a family member who was {@condition petrified} by a medusa.
I have an identical twin who is as different from me as any person could be.
I want to lead one faction of the guild to a new position of dominance.
I love spending time in the moss-covered building where I took part in my first reclamation mission.
I found something in the sewer that must never come to light.
I am forever grateful to the reclaimer who found me floating facedown in the sewer, moments from death.

entries.caption: Flaws
rows: Death comes for us all, so you can't expect me to take care of someone who can't fight it off.
I assume that anyone outside the Golgari looks down on me.
I feel a need for revenge against those who enjoy the privilege of living above ground.
I don't bother to couch my opinions in flattering words.
I can't help but pocket any trinket or coin I come across, no matter how worthless.
I'm convinced that I'm better and stronger than members of other guilds, isolated as they are from the realities of life and death.

entries.name: Contactos
entries: En la medida en que el Enjambre Golgari actúa como un único organismo, estás conectado a todos los demás miembros de una u otra manera. Convencido de que el resto del mundo va a por ti, te resulta fácil crear vínculos estrechos con tus compañeros de gremio, y más difícil establecer conexiones significativas con otros.
Tira dos veces en la tabla de contactos Golgari (para un aliado y un rival) y una vez en la tabla de contactos No-Golgari.
