entries.caption: Golgari Contacts
rows: One of my parents is an elite assassin, a member of the Ochran.
I learned combat from a kraul.
I know a medusa who is stationed in the guildhall.
I had a torrid romance with a spore druid responsible for a large rot farm.
There's a troll in a remote area of the undercity who seems to find me interesting—and who knows more than you'd think.
An elf lich is determined to see me become a lich someday, too.
A medusa decided it would be more fun to recruit me into the guild than to kill me.
I know a findbroker who can locate just about anything, for the right price.

entries.caption: Non-Golgari Contacts
rows: An Azorius arrester I literally pulled out of the gutter will do anything for me.
Someone joined the Gruul in a battle against the Boros once, and the sergeant of that Boros squad would love to prove that it was me.
I had a romance with a Dimir agent whom I still feed secrets to.
Roll an additional Golgari contact; you can decide if the contact is an ally or a rival.
I joined the Gruul in a battle against the Boros once, and the chief of that small clan thanks me for turning the tide.
An Izzet scientist resents that I sold a scrapped invention I found in the sewer.
My undercity explorations led me into an Orzhov vault, and a spirit thinks I stole something valuable.
I found a baby beast and sold it to a Rakdos wrangler who remains grateful to me.
A Selesnya druid and I share an interest in the same garden, and we have enjoyable arguments there.
I regularly pick up refuse from beneath a Simic laboratory, and sometimes I talk to the researcher who dumps it there.

entries.name: ¿Cómo encajo?
entries: Como parte del Enjambre Golgari, eres un instrumento especializado del cuerpo mayor. Tus órdenes, cuando las tienes, provienen del maestro del gremio a través de sus cancilleres, que llevan sus mensajes a todo el gremio. El enjambre confía en ti para que promuevas el bien mayor protegiendo alguna parte, por pequeña que sea, de su existencia. Esa responsabilidad no significa que seas indispensable; tu eventual muerte también forma parte de tu propósito y función, y serás reemplazado incluso cuando tu cuerpo proporcione nutrientes para fomentar el crecimiento del enjambre.

Un papel de aventurero clásico para un miembro de los Golgari consiste en arrastrarse por entornos similares a las mazmorras -las alcantarillas y las antiguas bóvedas de la ciudad subterránea- en busca de los tesoros que han dejado los muertos. A veces se te envía a buscar un objeto específico que se cree perdido en una parte peligrosa de la ciudad subterránea. En otras ocasiones, se te pedirá que recojas muestras de un hongo específico, que recuperes un cuerpo que flota en la suciedad de las alcantarillas o que traigas cualquier botín que pueda ayudar a llenar las arcas del enjambre.

Puede que ganes suficiente renombre para convertirte en miembro del Ochran, asignado a una serie de tareas relacionadas con el robo, el asesinato o la protección de figuras importantes de tu gremio. Puede que robes algo porque el gremio lo necesita, o porque su pérdida perjudicará a otro gremio, acelerando el declive de ese grupo. Se te podría asignar la tarea de matar a un enemigo abierto y activo de los Golgari, como un capitán Boros demasiado entusiasta cuyas incursiones en la ciudad subterránea se han acercado peligrosamente al santuario interior del enjambre. O podrías servir como guardaespaldas de uno de los altos cancilleres del Guildmaster Jarad, escoltando a esta figura a través de la subciudad mientras estás preparado para intervenir en un momento dado si las cosas se tuercen.

Los chamanes de los Golgari utilizan su magia para acelerar el ciclo de descomposición y rebrote. Puede que te envíen a esparcir esporas por una zona que los Golgari quieren reclamar como su territorio o a convencer a los habitantes de dicho territorio para que lo abandonen. También puedes enfrentarte a la amenaza siempre presente de monstruos hostiles que invaden las regiones controladas por los Golgari.

_.special: gold-plated ring depicting a smiling face

items.name: Competencias en herramientas:
items.entry: Un tipo de {@filter instrumento musical|items|source=phb|miscellaneous=mundane|type=instrument}, {@item thieves' tools|phb}

items.name: Equipamiento:
items.entry: Un conjunto de {@item fine clothes|phb}, un {@item disguise kit|phb}, un {@filter instrumento musical|items|source=phb|miscellaneous=mundane|type=instrument} de tu elección, un anillo chapado en oro que representa una cara sonriente y un {@item pouch|phb} que contiene 15 gp.

entries.name: Reportaje: La balada del tonto sonriente
entries: Como todo Grinner, sabes encontrar un escondite. En cualquier ciudad de 10.000 habitantes o más de la Costa de la Menagerie o en las tierras del Imperio Dwendaliano, puedes tocar la "Balada del Tonto Sonriente" en una taberna o posada importante. Un miembro del Grin Dorado te encontrará y te dará refugio a ti y a los compañeros que avales. Este refugio puede interrumpirse si se vuelve demasiado peligroso esconderte, a discreción del DM.
Esta característica debe utilizarse con precaución, ya que no todos los que conocen la balada son tus amigos. Algunos son traidores, contraespías o agentes de la tiranía.

entries.name: Características sugeridas
entries: Los Grinners están entrenados en el arte del secreto y la insinuación, y son expertos en ocultarse a la vista siendo la persona más ruidosa y brillante de la habitación. Sus habilidades para el subterfugio y el combate se prestan bien a un estilo de vida aventurero, y viajar con mercenarios y cazadores de tesoros crea una excusa conveniente para viajar a través de tierras doblegadas por la tiranía.

rows: I love the spotlight. Everyone, look at me!
Give me a drink and I'm your friend.
Talk to me about yourself. I'm a hell of a listener.
I hate to start fights, but I love to finish them.
I can't sit still.
I'm always humming an old tune from my past.
When I don't have a reason to smile, I'm miserable.
I'm lucky like you wouldn't believe.
Revolution. Tyrants must fall, no matter the cost. (Chaotic)
Compassion. The only way to make a better world is to perform small kindnesses. (Good)
Justice. A nation built upon just foundations will uphold freedom for all. (Law)
Expression. Music, joy, and laughter are the keys to freedom. (Good)
Self-Determination. People should be free to do as they please. (Chaotic)
Vigilance. A free people must be carefully taught, lest they be misled. (Neutral)
I lost someone important to an agent of the Dwendalian Empire. That regime will fall.
The first people to be hurt by this war will be the common folk. I need to protect them.
Music helped me through a dark time in my life. Now, I'll use music to change the world.
I will be known as the greatest spy who ever lived.
All life is precious to me. I know I can change the world without taking a humanoid life.
The elite in their ivory towers don't understand how we suffer. I intend to show them.
I've never lied once in my life. What? No, I'm not crossing my fingers!
I do everything big! Subtlety? I don't know the meaning of subtlety! Oh, that's a problem?
Being a spy in wartime is painful. I've seen so much suffering, I think I'm losing my mind.
I can't focus on my mission. I just want to carouse and sing and play!
Yeah, that's my name. Yeah, I'm a Grinner spy. Who cares about staying undercover?
I can't afford to trust anyone. Not. Anyone.

items.name: Idiomas:
items.entry: Elige uno de los siguientes: dracónico, gigante, duende o silvano

items.name: Equipamiento:
items.entry: Una insignia Gruul, un {@item hunting trap|phb}, un {@item herbalism kit|phb}, el cráneo de un jabalí, una capa de piel de bestia, un conjunto de {@item traveler's clothes|phb}, y un cinturón {@item pouch|phb} que contiene 10 gp (Azorius 1-zino monedas)

entries.name: Reportaje: Refugio de escombros
entries: Estás íntimamente familiarizado con las zonas de la ciudad que la mayoría de la gente evita: los barrios en ruinas en los que los gusanos arrasaron, los parques cubiertos de maleza que ninguna mano ha cuidado en décadas, y los vastos cinturones de escombros del terreno roto que la gente civilizada ha abandonado hace tiempo. En estas zonas puedes encontrar un lugar adecuado para que tú y tus aliados os escondáis o descanséis. Además, puedes encontrar comida y agua fresca en estas zonas para ti y hasta cinco personas más cada día.

entries.name: Hechizos del Gremio Gruul
entries: {@i Prerrequisito: Hechizo o característica de clase Pacto Mágico}

Para ti, los hechizos de la tabla de Hechizos del Gremio Gruul se añaden a la lista de hechizos de tu clase de hechicero. (Si eres un personaje multiclase con varias listas de hechizos, estos hechizos se añaden a todas ellas).

entries.caption: Gruul Guild Spells
rows: Cantrip
{@spell fire bolt}, {@spell produce flame}
1st
{@spell compelled duel}, {@spell speak with animals}, {@spell thunderwave}
2nd
{@spell beast sense}, {@spell shatter}
3rd
{@spell conjure animals}, {@spell conjure barrage}
4th
{@spell dominate beast}, {@spell stoneskin}
5th
{@spell destructive wave}

entries: Alimentada por el fuego de la rabia que arde en tu corazón, tu magia casi siempre va acompañada de efectos ardientes, como las llamas que arden detrás de tus ojos o que bailan sobre tus manos.

entries.name: Características sugeridas
entries: Las costumbres gruul no son las de la gente civilizada, y los gruul tienen poca paciencia para las sutilezas sociales. Pero tienen tradiciones y valores muy apreciados, tan importantes para ellos como los diferentes valores de la cultura urbana y cosmopolita de Rávnica.

entries.caption: Personality Traits
rows: Unlike people, the beasts of the wild are friends who won't stab me in the back.
Go ahead and insult me—I dare you.
I scorn those who can't survive away from the comforts of the city.
Don't tell me I'm not allowed to do something.
Laws are for people who are afraid to face their inner beasts.
I smear the blood of my enemies over my skin.
I was, in fact, raised by maaka.
HarrRRAAGGHH! [I rarely form a coherent sentence and prefer to express myself by breaking things.]

entries.caption: Ideals
rows: {@b Clan}. My clan is all that really matters. (Any)
{@b Anarchy}. No person or law or custom can tell another what to do. (Chaotic)
{@b Nature}. We weren't born tame or domesticated, so we shouldn't have to live that way. (Neutral)
{@b Might}. The strongest are meant to dominate the weak. (Evil)
{@b Rage}. AAAAAARRRRggggh! [To live is to feel and express the rage burning in your belly.] (Chaotic)
{@b Tradition}. The Old Ways must be preserved and upheld. (Any)

entries.caption: Bonds
rows: I am determined that one day I will lead my clan—or a new one.
I would give my life for my clan chieftain.
The chieftain of another clan has a grudge against me.
I am devoted to a sacred site in the midst of the rubblebelt.
My weapon is made from the first raktusk I ever hunted.
GrrrRRAAAAGGHH! [I will do anything to prove myself greater than my siblings or ancestors.]

entries.caption: Flaws
rows: If you question my courage, I will never back down.
HrrrGGGAAAARRuuuh! [My anger in battle led to the death of a loved one.]
I'm as stubborn as a batterboar.
I'm so convinced of my superiority over soft, civilized people that I'll take great risks to prove it.
I'm easily manipulated by people I find attractive.
I'm not actually all that angry.

entries.name: Contactos
entries: Los miembros de los Clanes Gruul se apoyan unos a otros, incluso cuando compiten por el territorio y la gloria. Sus encuentros con los miembros de otros gremios suelen ser más violentos que amistosos, pero de vez en cuando se crean vínculos.
Tira dos veces en la tabla de Contactos Gruul (para un aliado y un rival) y una vez en la tabla de Contactos No Gruul.

entries.caption: Gruul Contacts
rows: One of my parents is a renowned warrior in my clan.
My sibling has the ear of the clan chief.
I have cousins in a different clan.
When we were younger, I was romantically involved with a prominent warrior in my clan.
A druid in my clan believes I have a destiny to fulfill.
The warrior who trained me remembers me for my exceptional potential.
My clan chief killed one of my parents, who had challenged the chief for leadership of the clan. Some combination of resentment and remorse stirs the clan chief to help me sometimes.
I made a strong impression on Borborygmos.

entries.caption: Non-Gruul Contacts
rows: An Azorius arrester thinks I can be reformed.
A Boros soldier gives me gifts in exchange for information about other clans' movements.
I once caught and released a Dimir spy.
I consult with a Golgari shaman for spiritual guidance at times.
Roll an additional Gruul contact; you can decide if the contact is an ally or a rival.
An Izzet scientist blames the Gruul for the destruction of his life's work in a raid, but seems to think that I'm not like other Gruul.
I foolishly borrowed money from an Orzhov syndic to indulge a shameful vice.
A close friend left our clan and joined the Cult of Rakdos.
A distant relative is trying to recruit me into the Selesnya Conclave.
I stopped a Simic biomancer from trapping wild beasts to perform vile experiments on them.

entries.name: ¿Cómo encajo?
entries: Al servicio de un objetivo sencillo, tienes un papel sencillo que desempeñar: Luchar. Desata tu furia. Aplasta edificios y derrota a los que se interponen en tu camino. Sé Gruul, a tu manera.

A menudo se te llamará para que participes en una incursión que tu clan lance contra la ciudad o contra un grupo de sus defensores. El líder de tu clan también puede enviarte a una misión especial, aunque casi seguro que también se considerará una incursión. Podrías unirte a un pequeño grupo de guerreros Gruul en una peligrosa carga en lo más profundo de las calles asentadas para saquear un determinado lugar, recuperar un objeto robado a tu clan o asaltar una guarnición de Boros.

A veces tu objetivo puede ser más esotérico. Dado que las profecías sobre el regreso de Ilharg el Jabalí se extienden como un reguero de pólvora entre los druidas de Gruul, es posible que se te pida que lleves a cabo alguna tarea que los druidas crean que acelerará su llegada. Dicha tarea podría consistir en recoger una reliquia sagrada guardada en una bóveda de Orzhov o en recoger sacrificios para una gran ceremonia en honor del Raze-Boar.

_.special: letter of introduction from your guild

items.name: Competencias en herramientas:
items.entry: Un tipo de {@filter herramientas del artesano|items|source=phb|miscellaneous=mundane|type=artisan's tools}

items.name: Equipamiento:
items.entry: Un juego de {@filter herramientas del artesano|items|source=phb|miscellaneous=mundane|type=artisan's tools} (uno de tu elección), una carta de presentación de tu gremio, un juego de {@item traveler's clothes|phb} y un cinturón {@item pouch|phb} con 15 gp.

entries.name: Artículo: Afiliación al gremio
entries: Como miembro establecido y respetado de un gremio, puede contar con ciertos beneficios que la afiliación proporciona. Tus compañeros del gremio te proporcionarán alojamiento y comida si es necesario, y pagarán tu funeral si es necesario. En algunas ciudades y pueblos, un gremio ofrece un lugar central para reunirse con otros miembros de tu profesión, lo que puede ser un buen lugar para conocer a posibles mecenas, aliados o asalariados.

Los gremios suelen tener un enorme poder político. Si te acusan de un delito, tu gremio te apoyará si se puede demostrar tu inocencia o si el delito es justificable. También puedes tener acceso a poderosas figuras políticas a través del gremio, si eres un miembro en regla. Estas conexiones pueden requerir la donación de dinero u objetos mágicos a las arcas del gremio.
Debes pagar una cuota de 5 gp al mes al gremio. Si no pagas, deberás compensar las cuotas atrasadas para seguir en la buena onda del gremio.

entries.name: Especialidad
entries: Los gremios suelen encontrarse en ciudades lo suficientemente grandes como para mantener a varios artesanos que practican el mismo oficio. Sin embargo, tu gremio puede ser una red informal de artesanos que trabajan en un pueblo diferente dentro de un reino más grande. Trabaja con tu DM para determinar la naturaleza de tu gremio. Puedes seleccionar el negocio de tu gremio de la tabla de negocios del gremio o tirar al azar.

rows: Alchemists and apothecaries
Armorers, locksmiths, and finesmiths
Brewers, distillers, and vintners
Calligraphers, scribes, and scriveners
Carpenters, roofers, and plasterers
Cartographers, surveyors, and chart-makers
Cobblers and shoemakers
Cooks and bakers
Glassblowers and glaziers
Jewelers and gemcutters
Leatherworkers, skinners, and tanners
Masons and stonecutters
Painters, limners, and sign-makers
Potters and tile-makers
Shipwrights and sail-makers
Smiths and metal-forgers
Tinkers, pewterers, and casters
Wagon-makers and wheelwrights
Weavers and dyers
Woodcarvers, coopers, and bowyers

entries.name: Características sugeridas
entries: Los artesanos del gremio se encuentran entre las personas más corrientes del mundo, hasta que dejan sus herramientas y emprenden una carrera de aventurero. Entienden el valor del trabajo duro y la importancia de la comunidad, pero son vulnerables a los pecados de avaricia y codicia.

rows: I believe that anything worth doing is worth doing right. I can't help it—I'm a perfectionist.
I'm a snob who looks down on those who can't appreciate fine art.
I always want to know how things work and what makes people tick.
I'm full of witty aphorisms and have a proverb for every occasion.
I'm rude to people who lack my commitment to hard work and fair play.
I like to talk at length about my profession.
I don't part with my money easily and will haggle tirelessly to get the best deal possible.
I'm well known for my work, and I want to make sure everyone appreciates it. I'm always taken aback when people haven't heard of me.
Community. It is the duty of all civilized people to strengthen the bonds of community and the security of civilization. (Lawful)
Generosity. My talents were given to me so that I could use them to benefit the world. (Good)
Freedom. Everyone should be free to pursue his or her own livelihood. (Chaotic)
Greed. I'm only in it for the money. (Evil)
People. I'm committed to the people I care about, not to ideals. (Neutral)
Aspiration. I work hard to be the best there is at my craft. (Any)
The workshop where I learned my trade is the most important place in the world to me.
I created a great work for someone, and then found them unworthy to receive it. I'm still looking for someone worthy.
I owe my guild a great debt for forging me into the person I am today.
I pursue wealth to secure someone's love.
One day I will return to my guild and prove that I am the greatest artisan of them all.
I will get revenge on the evil forces that destroyed my place of business and ruined my livelihood.
I'll do anything to get my hands on something rare or priceless.
I'm quick to assume that someone is trying to cheat me.
No one must ever learn that I once stole money from guild coffers.
I'm never satisfied with what I have—I always want more.
I would kill to acquire a noble title.
I'm horribly jealous of anyone who can outshine my handiwork. Everywhere I go, I'm surrounded by rivals.

items.name: Competencias en herramientas:
items.entry: Un tipo de {@filter set de juego|items|source=phb|miscellaneous=mundane|type=gaming set}, {@filter vehículos (agua)|items|source=phb;dmg|miscellaneous=mundane|type=vehicle (water)}

items.name: Equipamiento:
items.entry: {@item Fishing tackle|phb}, {@item dice set|phb}, {@item playing card set|phb}, o {@item Three-Dragon Ante set|phb}, un conjunto de {@item common clothes|phb}, {@item rowboat}, y un cinturón {@item pouch|phb} que contiene 5 gp

entries.name: Estilo de vida
entries: Pobre

entries.name: Visión general
entries: Eres uno de los cientos de pescadores artesanales que cada mañana transportan la recompensa del puerto de agua dulce de Mulmaster a los mercados de la ciudad. Has pasado innumerables días remando en las aguas de Mulmaster y sus alrededores y los conoces a ellos y a los demás pescadores, estibadores y habitantes del puerto mejor que nadie. Aunque has dejado atrás esa vida, sigues visitándola de vez en cuando.

entries.name: Reportaje: Harborfolk
entries: Creciste en los muelles y aguas del puerto de Mulmaster. Los portuarios te recuerdan y aún te tratan como uno de ellos. Te acogen a ti y a tus compañeros. Aunque puede que te cobren por ello, siempre te ofrecerán la comida y el refugio que tengan; incluso te esconderán si la Guardia de la Ciudad te persigue (pero no si lo hacen los Halcones). Nota: Este rasgo es una variante del rasgo Héroe popular.

rows: I am curious. I want to know why things are the way they are and why people do the things that they do.
I can't sing, but that never stops me from doing it, loudly. Everyone loves a good sea chanty!
I think the High Blade is doing a terrific job, don't you?
I'm very excited that the House Built on Gold is being restored. I am a zealous worshipper of Waukeen.
I am quite superstitious. I see portents in everyday occurrences.
I resent the rich and enjoy thwarting their plans and spoiling their fun in small ways.
I have a sea story to fit every occasion.
I'm a fisher, but I secretly detest eating fish. I will do anything to avoid it.
Calm. For all things, there is a tide. I set sail when it is right, and mend my nets when it is not. (Lawful)
Windblown. I go where the winds blow. No man or woman tells me where or when to sail. (Chaotic)
Aspiring. I will gain the favor of a Zor or Zora patron, maybe even one of the Blades! (Any)
Salty. I want people to look to me as an expert on plying Mulmaster Harbor. (Any)
Selfless. We are all children of the sea. I help everyone in peril afloat and ashore. (Good)
Let them Drown. I refuse to risk my hide to help others. They wouldn't help me if roles were reversed. (Evil)
I once lost everything but my rowboat. I'll do anything to protect it.
My brother was in the Soldiery, but he was killed. I really look up to the men and women who serve.
The Cloaks killed my friend for spellcasting. I'll get them back somehow, someday.
The High House of Hurting helped me when I was hurt and asked nothing in return. I owe them my life.
I was robbed in the Zhent ghetto once. It will not happen again.
I would do anything to protect the other harborfolk. They are my family.
I drink too much, which causes me to miss the tide.
I killed a drunk member of the City Watch in a brawl. I am terrified that they might find out.
I oversell myself and make promises I can't keep when I want to impress someone.
Book learning is a waste of time. I have no patience for people who don't speak from experience.
I almost always cheat. I can't help myself.
I am a secret informant for the Hawks. I send them reports about everything I see and hear, even what my friends and allies are up to.

_.displayName: trinket of special significance (choose one or roll on the Horror Trinkets table)

items.name: Habilidades:
items.entry: Elija dos de entre {@skill Arcana}, {@skill Investigation}, {@skill Religion} o {@skill Survival}

items.name: Idiomas:
items.entry: Elija dos, uno de los cuales debe ser {@language Abyssal}, {@language Celestial}, {@language Deep Speech}, {@language Draconic}, {@language Infernal}, {@language Primordial}, {@language Sylvan}, o {@language Undercommon}

items.name: Equipamiento:
items.entry: {@item Monster hunter's pack|vrgr} (que contiene un {@item chest|PHB}, un {@item crowbar|PHB}, un {@item hammer|PHB}, tres estacas de madera, un {@item holy symbol|PHB}, un {@item Holy Water (flask)|PHB|flask of holy water}, un {@item Manacles|PHB|set of manacles}, un {@item steel mirror|PHB}, un {@item Oil (flask)|PHB|flask of oil}, un {@item tinderbox|PHB}, y 3 {@item Torch|PHB|torches}), un juego de {@item common clothes|phb}, un {@item trinket|CoS} de significado especial (elegir uno o tirar en la tabla del {@item Horror Trinket|VRGR|Horror Trinkets}), y 1 sp.

entries.name: Reportaje: El corazón de las tinieblas
entries: Quienes te miran a los ojos pueden ver que te has enfrentado a un horror inimaginable y que no eres ajeno a la oscuridad. Aunque te teman, los plebeyos te ofrecerán toda la cortesía y harán todo lo posible por ayudarte. A menos que hayas demostrado ser un peligro para ellos, incluso tomarán las armas para luchar junto a ti, si te encuentras solo ante un enemigo.

entries.name: Evento desgarrador
entries: Antes de convertirse en aventurero, su camino en la vida estaba definido por un momento oscuro, una decisión fatídica o una tragedia. Ahora sientes que una oscuridad amenaza con consumirte y temes que no haya esperanza de escapar. Escoge un acontecimiento angustioso que te persiga, o tira uno en la tabla de Acontecimientos Angustiosos.

entries.caption: Harrowing Event
rows: A monster that slaughtered dozens of innocent people spared your life, and you don't know why.
You were born under a dark star. You can feel it watching you, coldly and distantly. Sometimes it beckons you in the dead of night.
An apparition that has haunted your family for generations now haunts you. You don't know what it wants, and it won't leave you alone.
Your family has a history of practicing the dark arts. You dabbled once and felt something horrible clutch at your soul, whereupon you fled in terror.
An oni took your sibling one cold, dark night, and you were unable to stop it.
You were cursed with lycanthropy and later cured. You are now haunted by the innocents you slaughtered.
A hag kidnapped and raised you. You escaped, but the hag still has a magical hold over you and fills your mind with evil thoughts.
You opened an eldritch tome and saw things unfit for a sane mind. You burned the book, but its words and images are burned into your psyche.
A fiend possessed you as a child. You were locked away but escaped. The fiend is still inside you, but now you try to keep it bottled up.
You did terrible things to avenge the murder of someone you loved. You became a monster, and it haunts your waking dreams.

entries.name: Características del terror
entries: Los personajes de una campaña centrada en el terror pueden tener motivaciones y características distintas. Utiliza las siguientes tablas para complementar las características sugeridas por tu trasfondo o para inspirar las de tu propio diseño.

entries.caption: Horror Character Personality Traits
rows: I had an encounter that I believe gives me a special affinity with a supernatural creature or event.
A signature piece of clothing or distinct weapon serves as an emblem of who I am.
I never accept that I'm out of my depth.
I must know the answer to every secret. No door remains unopened in my presence.
I let people underestimate me, revealing my full competency only to those close to me.
I compulsively seek to collect trophies of my travels and victories.
It doesn't matter if the whole world's against me. I'll always do what I think is right.
I have morbid interests and a macabre aesthetic.
I have a personal ritual, mantra, or relaxation method I use to deal with stress.
Nothing is more important than life, and I never leave anyone in danger.
I'm quick to jump to extreme solutions. Why risk a lesser option not working?
I'm easily startled, but I'm not a coward.

entries.caption: Horror Character Ideals
rows: Adrenaline. I've experienced such strangeness that now I feel alive only in extreme situations.
Balance. I strive to counter the deeds of someone for whom I feel responsible.
Bound. I've wronged someone and must work their will to avoid their curse.
Escape. I believe there is something beyond the world I know, and I need to find it.
Legacy. I must do something great so that I'm remembered, and my time is running out.
Misdirection. I work vigorously to keep others from realizing my flaws or misdeeds.
Obsession. I've lived this way for so long that I can't imagine another way.
Obligation. I owe it to my people, faith, family, or teacher to continue a vaunted legacy.
Promise. My life is no longer my own. I must fulfill the dream of someone who's gone.
Revelation. I need to know what lies beyond the mysteries of death, the world, or the Mists.
Sanctuary. I know the forces at work in the world and strive to create islands apart from them.
Truth. I care about the truth above all else, even if it doesn't benefit anyone.

entries.caption: Horror Character Bonds
rows: I desperately need to get back to someone or someplace, but I lost them in the Mists.
Everything I do is in the service of a powerful master, one I must keep a secret from everyone.
I owe much to my vanished mentor. I seek to continue their work even as I search to find them.
I've seen great darkness, and I'm committed to being a light against it—the light of all lights.
Someone I love has become a monster, murderer, or other threat. It's up to me to redeem them.
The world has been convinced of a terrible lie. It's up to me to reveal the truth.
I deeply miss someone and am quick to adopt people who remind me of them.
A great evil dwells within me. I will fight against it and the world's other evils for as long as I can.
I'm desperately seeking a cure to an affliction or a curse, either for someone close to me for myself.
Spirits are drawn to me. I do all I can to help them find peace.
I use my cunning mind to solve mysteries and find justice for those who've been wronged.
I lost someone I care about, but I still see them in guilty visions, recurring dreams, or as a spirit.

entries.caption: Horror Character Flaws
rows: I believe doom follows me and that anyone who gets close to me will face a tragic end.
I'm convinced something is after me, appearing in mirrors, dreams, and places where no one could.
I'm especially superstitious and live life seeking to avoid bad luck, wicked spirits, or the Mists.
I've done unspeakable evil and will do anything to prevent others from finding out.
I am exceptionally credulous and believe any story or legend immediately.
I'm a skeptic and don't believe in the power of rituals, religion, superstition, or spirits.
I know my future is written and that anything I do will lead to a prophesied end.
I need to find the best in everyone and everything, even when that means denying obvious malice.
I've seen the evil of a type of place—like forests, cities, or graveyards—and resist going there.
I'm exceptionally cautious, planning laboriously and devising countless contingencies.
I have a reputation for defeating a great evil, but that's a lie and the wicked force knows.
I know the ends always justify the means and am quick to make sacrifices to attain my goals.

_.displayName: scroll case stuffed full of notes from your studies or prayers

items.name: Equipamiento:
items.entry: Un {@item Map or Scroll Case|phb|scroll case} de peluche lleno de notas de tus estudios o rezos, un {@item blanket|phb} de invierno, un juego de {@item common clothes|phb}, un {@item herbalism kit|phb}, y 5 gp

entries.name: Reportaje: Descubrimiento
entries: La tranquila reclusión de tu ermita extendida te dio acceso a un descubrimiento único y poderoso. La naturaleza exacta de esta revelación depende de la naturaleza de tu reclusión. Podría ser una gran verdad sobre el cosmos, las deidades, los poderosos seres de los planos exteriores o las fuerzas de la naturaleza. Podría ser un sitio que nadie más ha visto. Puede que hayas descubierto un hecho olvidado durante mucho tiempo, o que hayas desenterrado alguna reliquia del pasado que podría reescribir la historia. Puede tratarse de una información que perjudique a las personas que te han exiliado y, por tanto, la razón de tu regreso a la sociedad.
Trabaje con su DM para determinar los detalles de su descubrimiento y su impacto en la campaña.

entries.name: Especialidad
entries: ¿Cuál fue la razón de tu aislamiento, y qué cambió para permitirte terminar con tu soledad? Puedes trabajar con tu DM para determinar la naturaleza exacta de tu aislamiento, o puedes elegir o tirar en la tabla de abajo para determinar la razón de tu aislamiento.

rows: I was searching for spiritual enlightenment.
I was partaking of communal living in accordance with the dictates of a religious order.
I was exiled for a crime I didn't commit.
I retreated from society after a life-altering event.
I needed a quiet place to work on my art, literature, music, or manifesto.
I needed to commune with nature, far from civilization.
I was the caretaker of an ancient ruin or relic.
I was a pilgrim in search of a person, place, or relic of spiritual significance.

entries.name: Características sugeridas
entries: Algunos ermitaños se adaptan bien a una vida de reclusión, mientras que otros se resisten a ella y anhelan la compañía. Tanto si abrazan la soledad como si anhelan escapar de ella, la vida solitaria determina sus actitudes e ideales. Algunos se vuelven un poco locos por sus años de separación de la sociedad.

rows: I've been isolated for so long that I rarely speak, preferring gestures and the occasional grunt.
I am utterly serene, even in the face of disaster.
The leader of my community had something wise to say on every topic, and I am eager to share that wisdom.
I feel tremendous empathy for all who suffer.
I'm oblivious to etiquette and social expectations.
I connect everything that happens to me to a grand, cosmic plan.
I often get lost in my own thoughts and contemplation, becoming oblivious to my surroundings.
I am working on a grand philosophical theory and love sharing my ideas.
Greater Good. My gifts are meant to be shared with all, not used for my own benefit. (Good)
Logic. Emotions must not cloud our sense of what is right and true, or our logical thinking. (Lawful)
Free Thinking. Inquiry and curiosity are the pillars of progress. (Chaotic)
Power. Solitude and contemplation are paths toward mystical or magical power. (Evil)
Live and Let Live. Meddling in the affairs of others only causes trouble. (Neutral)
Self-Knowledge. If you know yourself, there's nothing left to know. (Any)
Nothing is more important than the other members of my hermitage, order, or association.
I entered seclusion to hide from the ones who might still be hunting me. I must someday confront them.
I'm still seeking the enlightenment I pursued in my seclusion, and it still eludes me.
I entered seclusion because I loved someone I could not have.
Should my discovery come to light, it could bring ruin to the world.
My isolation gave me great insight into a great evil that only I can destroy.
Now that I've returned to the world, I enjoy its delights a little too much.
I harbor dark, bloodthirsty thoughts that my isolation and meditation failed to quell.
I am dogmatic in my thoughts and philosophy.
I let my need to win arguments overshadow friendships and harmony.
I'd risk too much to uncover a lost bit of knowledge.
I like keeping secrets and won't share them with anyone.

_.special: letter of introduction from your family's trading house

items.name: Equipamiento:
items.entry: Un juego de {@item fine clothes|phb}, un {@item signet ring|phb}, una carta de presentación de la casa comercial de tu familia y un monedero con 25 gp.

entries.name: Estilo de vida
entries: Wealthy

entries.name: Visión general
entries: Antes de convertirte en aventurero, eras un exitoso mercader que operaba en Hillsfar, la Ciudad del Comercio. Tu familia gestionaba almacenes, organizaba caravanas, dirigía tiendas o era propietaria de un barco y tenía contactos comerciales en toda la región de Moonsea, así como a lo largo de la Costa de la Espada. Tal vez importen mineral, gemas sin cortar, pieles sin tratar o grano a la Ciudad del Comercio, o exporten telas finas, gemas facetadas, pieles finas o Aliento de Dragón, un licor parecido al brandy. En cualquier caso, por alguna razón has abandonado esa vida y has optado por buscar aventuras. Sin embargo, el entrenamiento que recibiste entonces, y quizás los contactos que hiciste, te sirven como aventurero.
Elija una de las siguientes características:

entries.name: Función: Factor
entries: Aunque has dejado atrás el día a día de un mercader, tu familia te ha asignado los servicios de un leal empleado del negocio, un factor, un agente de la agricultura, un marinero, un guardia de caravanas o un oficinista. Este individuo es un plebeyo que puede realizar tareas mundanas para ti, como hacer compras, entregar mensajes y hacer recados. No luchará por ti y no te seguirá a zonas obviamente peligrosas (como las mazmorras), y se marchará si se le pone en peligro o se le maltrata con frecuencia. Si lo matan, la familia te asigna otro en pocos días. Nota: Este rasgo es una variante del rasgo Retenedores del Caballero Noble.

entries.name: Característica alternativa: Contacto comercial
entries: Tú y tu familia tenéis contactos comerciales como maestros de caravanas, comerciantes, marineros, artesanos y granjeros en toda la región de Moonsea y en toda la Costa de la Espada. Una vez por sesión de juego, cuando te aventures en cualquiera de esas zonas, puedes utilizar esos contactos para obtener información sobre la zona local o para transmitir un mensaje a alguien de esas zonas, incluso a través de la gran distancia que hay entre las dos zonas. Nota: Este rasgo es una variante de los rasgos Contacto criminal e Investigador.

rows: I fill my evenings with wine or mead and song.
I greatly admire gladiators and enjoy the Arena.
I take my wealth for granted. It seldom occurs to me that others aren't rich themselves.
I leave broken hearts all around the Moonsea and up and down the Sword Coast.
I work hard and seldom make time for fun.
I am a particularly devout and pray often.
The Red Plumes caught me once. I hate them.
I ask a lot of questions to get information about those with whom I am working and dealing.
Frugal. I spend my money very carefully. (Lawful)
Profligate. I tend to spend extravagantly. (Chaotic)
Honest. I deal with others above board. (Any)
Sharp. I seek to make the best deal possible. (Any)
Charitable. I give generously to others. (Good)
Greedy. I do not share my wealth with others. (Evil)
I am fiercely loyal to those with whom I work.
I must uphold the good name of my family.
I will prove myself to my family as an adventurer.
Deals are sacrosanct. I never go back on my word.
I love making deals and negotiating agreements.
I guard my wealth jealously.
I am a braggart. I promote myself shamelessly.
I am vain. I always wear the latest fashions.
I am a glutton. I eat and drink to excess.
I am a snob. I want only the finest things in life.
I am lazy. I want others to take care of everything.
I am overconfident. I overestimate my abilities.

items.name: Equipamiento:
items.entry: Un {@item forgery kit|phb}, un conjunto de {@item common clothes|phb}, un cinturón {@item pouch|phb}, y 5 gp

entries.name: Estilo de vida
entries: Modesto

entries.name: Visión general
entries: Hillsfar es la Ciudad del Comercio. Sin embargo, la Gran Ley del Comercio sólo protege el comercio "legítimo", el que pasa por la única puerta de la ciudad, que los Plumas Rojas vigilan y gravan. Y la Gran Ley de la Humanidad prohíbe la entrada de los no humanos a la ciudad. Las dos Grandes Leyes crean una gran demanda y un gran riesgo para los contrabandistas, que introducen y sacan de la ciudad mercancías ilícitas y no humanas por rutas secretas. El Gremio de Pícaros controla estrictamente toda esta actividad, sacando su tajada de los trabajos sancionados y castigando los trabajos independientes.

Tal vez trafiques con Aliento de Dragón (un licor parecido al brandy) para evitar los aranceles o con contrabando para evitar las incautaciones, o tal vez seas un humano que simpatiza con los no humanos y trabajes como parte de la red de rutas secretas y casas seguras que les ayuda a pasar por Hillsfar. En cualquier caso, tienes contactos en la comunidad de contrabandistas que pueden ayudarte a entrar y salir de la ciudad sin que se note, por un precio.

entries.name: Reportaje: Pasaje secreto
entries: Puedes recurrir a tus contactos dentro de la comunidad de contrabandistas para que te aseguren un pasaje secreto dentro o fuera de Hillsfar para ti y tus compañeros de aventura, sin preguntas y sin enredos de Pluma Roja. Como estás pidiendo un favor, no puedes estar seguro de que puedan ayudar en tu horario o en absoluto. Tu Dungeon Master determinará si puedes entrar o salir de la ciudad de contrabando. A cambio de tu paso, tú y tus compañeros podéis deber un favor al Gremio de los Rouge y/o podéis tener que pagar sobornos. Nota: Este rasgo es una variante del rasgo Marinero.

rows: When I'm not smuggling, I gamble.
I just love Halfling cooking and baking!
I party with dwarves whenever I can.
I'm a terrible singer, but I love to do it.
I was raised to honor Chauntea and still do.
The blood sports of the Arena sicken me.
I think non-humans are really interesting.
I exaggerate the tales of my exploits.
Fair. I think everyone deserves to be treated fairly. I don't play favorites. (Lawful)
Impulsive. Planning is often a waste of time. No plan survives contact with reality. It's easier to dive in and deal with the consequences. (Chaotic)
Curious. I want to learn as much as I can about the people and places I encounter. (Any)
Prepared. I think success depends on preparing as much as possible in advance. (Any)
Respectful. I think everyone deserves to be treated with respect and dignity, regardless of their race, creed, color, or origin. (Good)
Corrupt. I will break the law or act dishonestly if the money is right. (Evil)
I am loyal to the Rogues Guild and would do anything for them.
I love the city of Hillsfar and my fellow Hillsfarians, despite the recent problems.
I admire the elves. I help them whenever I can.
A gnome helped me once. I pay the favor forward.
I enjoy tricking the Red Plumes at every opportunity.
I smuggled agricultural goods for non-human farmers. I try to help them when I can.
My hatred for the Red Plumes burns so brightly that I have difficulty suppressing It around them.
The Red Plumes caught me once before, and I was branded for my crime. If they catch me again, for any offense, the punishment will be dire.
I treat all Hillsfarans poorly. I am disgusted with their failure to revolt against the Great Law of Humanity.
I have difficulty trusting strangers. Anyone could be a spy for the authorities.
I am greedy. There Isn't much I won't do for money.
I'm an informant for the Red Plumes. They let me continue my activities, so long as I pass them information about illegal activity in Hillsfar.

entries.name: Papel
entries: Siempre recoges información para tu casa, pero cuando un barón te da una misión específica, ¿qué tipo de trabajo haces? La tabla de roles de agente de la casa ofrece posibilidades.

entries.caption: House Agent Role
rows: Acquisition
Investigation
Research & Development
Security
Intimidation
Exploration
Negotiation
Covert Operations

entries.name: Función: Conexiones domésticas
entries: Como agente de tu casa, siempre puedes conseguir comida y alojamiento para ti y tus amigos en un enclave de la casa. Cuando la casa te asigna una misión, suele proporcionarte los suministros y el transporte necesarios. Además de esto, tienes muchos viejos amigos, mentores y rivales en tu casa, y puede que te encuentres con alguno de ellos cuando interactúes con un negocio de la casa. El grado en que estos conocidos estén dispuestos a ayudarte depende de tu posición actual en tu casa.

entries.name: Características sugeridas
entries: Los agentes de la casa son diversos. Tenga en cuenta la casa a la que sirve y el trabajo que realiza a la hora de elegir las características.

entries.caption: Personality Traits
rows: I'm always looking to improve efficiency.
I love to share trivia about my house's business.
I never forget an insult against me or my house.
I'm enthusiastic about everything my house does.
I represent my house and take pride in my looks.
I'm critical of monarchies and limits on the houses.

entries.caption: Ideals
rows: {@b Common Good}. My house serves a vital function, and its prosperity will help everyone. (Good)
{@b Tradition}. I uphold traditions of my house and bring honor to my family. (Lawful)
{@b Innovation}. Abandon old traditions and find better ways to do things. (Chaotic)
{@b Power}. I want to ensure the prosperity of my house and wield its power myself. (Evil)
{@b Discovery}. I want to learn all I can, both for my house and for my own curiosity. (Any)
{@b Comfort}. I want to ensure that me and mine enjoy the best things in life. (Any)

entries.caption: Bonds
rows: My house is my family. I would do anything for it.
I love someone from another house, but the relationship is forbidden.
Someone I love was killed by a rival faction within my house, and I will have revenge.
I don't care about the house as a whole, but I would do anything for my old mentor.
My house must evolve, and I'll lead the evolution.
I'm determined to impress the leaders of my house, and to become a leader myself.

entries.caption: Flaws
rows: I'm fixated on following official protocols.
I'm obsessed with conspiracy theories and worried about secret societies and hidden demons.
My house and bloodline make me the best!
My secret could get me expelled from my house.
My religious beliefs aren't widespread in my house.
I'm working for a hidden faction in my house that gives me secret assignments.

items.name: Habilidades:
items.entry: {@skill Survival}, más uno de entre {@skill Arcana}, {@skill History} y {@skill Religion}

items.name: Competencias en herramientas:
items.entry: Puede elegir entre un {@filter set de juego|items|source=phb|miscellaneous=mundane|type=gaming set} o un {@filter instrumento musical|items|source=phb|miscellaneous=mundane|type=instrument}

items.name: Equipamiento:
items.entry: Tu herencia, un conjunto de {@item traveler's clothes|phb}, la herramienta que elijas para la competencia en herramientas de este trasfondo ({@filter set de juego|items|source=phb|miscellaneous=mundane|type=gaming set} o {@filter instrumento musical|items|source=phb|miscellaneous=mundane|type=instrument}), y un {@item pouch|phb} que contiene 15 gp.

entries.name: Función: Herencia
entries: Elige o determina al azar tu herencia de entre las posibilidades de la tabla siguiente. Trabaja con tu Dungeon Master para dar detalles: ¿Por qué es tan importante tu herencia y cuál es su historia completa? Puedes preferir que el DM invente estos detalles como parte del juego, permitiéndote aprender más sobre tu herencia a medida que tu personaje lo hace.

El Dungeon Master es libre de utilizar tu herencia como gancho de la historia, enviándote a misiones para aprender más sobre su historia o su verdadera naturaleza, o enfrentándote a enemigos que quieren reclamarla para sí mismos o impedir que aprendas lo que buscas. El DM también determina las propiedades de tu herencia y cómo se relacionan con la historia y la importancia del objeto. Por ejemplo, el objeto puede ser un objeto mágico menor, o uno que comienza con una habilidad modesta y aumenta su potencia con el paso del tiempo. O puede que la verdadera naturaleza de tu herencia no sea evidente al principio y sólo se revele cuando se cumplan ciertas condiciones.

Cuando comienzas tu carrera de aventurero, puedes decidir si contarles a tus compañeros tu herencia de inmediato. En lugar de atraer la atención hacia ti, es posible que quieras mantener tu herencia en secreto hasta que sepas más sobre lo que significa para ti y lo que puede hacer por ti.

rows: A document such as a map, a letter, or a journal
a trinket (see "Trinkets" in chapter 5 of the Player's Handbook)
an article of clothing
a piece of jewelry
an arcane book or formulary
a written story, song, poem, or secret
a tattoo or other body marking

entries.name: Características sugeridas
entries: Utiliza las tablas para el trasfondo {@background folk hero} del Manual del Jugador como base para tus rasgos y motivaciones, modificando las entradas cuando sea apropiado para adaptarlas a tu identidad como heredero.

Su vínculo podría estar directamente relacionado con su herencia, o con la persona de la que la recibió. Su ideal podría estar influenciado por lo que sabe sobre su herencia, o por lo que pretende hacer con su regalo una vez que se dé cuenta de lo que es capaz de hacer.

_.special: scroll containing the basic teachings of the five gods

items.name: Competencias en herramientas:
items.entry: Un tipo de {@filter set de juego|items|source=phb|miscellaneous=mundane|type=gaming set}, {@filter vehículos (terrestres)|items|source=phb;dmg|miscellaneous=mundane|type=vehicle (land)}

items.name: Equipamiento:
items.entry: Una simple caja rompecabezas, un pergamino que contiene las enseñanzas básicas de los cinco dioses, un {@filter set de juego|items|source=phb|miscellaneous=mundane|type=gaming set}, un juego de {@item common clothes|phb}, y un cinturón {@item pouch|phb} que contiene 15 gp. Si has completado alguna prueba antes del inicio de la campaña, también tienes los cartuchos que hayas ganado

entries.name: Reportaje: Las pruebas de los cinco dioses
entries: Tu vida se orienta en torno a tu participación en las cinco pruebas que determinarán tu valía en la otra vida. Mientras te preparas y te sometes a esas pruebas, tienes acceso constante al entrenamiento. Las momias sirvientes (las ungidas), bajo la supervisión de visires, te proporcionan un lugar cómodo para vivir y comidas regulares. Sólo podrás disfrutar de estos beneficios mientras obedezcas las normas sociales de Naktamun: entrenarte para las pruebas (con o sin tu cosecha), obedecer las órdenes de los dioses y seguir las instrucciones de sus visires. Si infringes estas normas, corres el riesgo de ser tratado como un disidente. Consulta "{@book Trials of the Five Gods|PS-A|3}" para obtener más información sobre las pruebas y sus recompensas.

entries.name: Características sugeridas
entries: La vida de un iniciado se centra en las pruebas, pero no tiene por qué centrarse únicamente en ellas. Aunque algunos iniciados están muy centrados en su formación, la mayoría se somete a esa formación mientras también experimenta alegría, dolor, amor, pérdida, ira, celos, esperanza, fe, deleite... toda la gama de emociones y experiencias mortales. La vida después de la muerte puede ser una presencia constante en la mente de cada iniciado, pero es la culminación de una vida bien vivida, no un sustituto de ella.

rows: I always have a joke on hand when the mood gets too serious.
I use sarcasm and insults to keep a distance between myself and my crop-mates, because I don't want to get attached to them.
I'll settle for nothing less than perfection—in myself, in my cropmates, in everything.
I'm so focused on the glorious afterlife that nothing in this life can shake my calm resolve.
I enjoy using my skills to help those who lack those same skills.
I train hard so that I can play hard at the end of the day. I fully expect to play even harder in the glorious afterlife, but I'm not in a hurry to get there.
I'm perfectly happy letting others pick up the slack for me while I take it easy.
I'm constantly sizing up everyone around me, thinking about what kind of opponent they'll be in the final trial.
{@b Solidarity.} The thing that matters most of all is that we're there for each other. (Lawful)
{@b Knowledge.} The world is a puzzle—a mystery waiting to be solved. (Neutral)
{@b Strength.} All that matters to me is my own perfection. Let everyone else seek that perfection in their own way. (Any)
{@b Ambition.} I'm going to prove that I deserve only the best—of everything. (Evil)
{@b Zeal.} Anything worth doing is worth throwing my whole self into. (Any)
{@b Redemption.} I will train all the harder to make up for the doubt I entertained when I was younger. (Any)
One of my crop-mates is my dearest friend, and I hope we will face each other in the final trial.
I am in love with a vizier.
I am particularly drawn to one of the five gods, and I want nothing more than to win that god's particular favor.
I am more devoted to Naktamun and its people than I am to any of the ideals of the gods.
My weapon was a gift from a beloved trainer who died in an accident.
I carry a memento of my time as an acolyte, and I treasure it above all other things.
I'm easily distracted by an attractive person, which could be the death of me in the trials.
I really wanted to be a vizier, and I'm angry at the god who didn't choose me.
Training for a lifetime to die in the end seems like a big waste of energy.
I'm not at all sure I'll be able to grant a glorified death to any of my crop-mates.
I have a lasting grudge against one of my crop-mates, and each of us wants to see the other fail.
I think I've figured out that this world is not what it seems. Something dark is going on here.

entries.replace: Reportaje: Las pruebas de los cinco dioses

items.name: Reportaje: Refugio de disidentes
entries: Si quieren tener alguna esperanza de sobrevivir, ya sea escondidos en la ciudad o expulsados al desierto, los disidentes deben ayudarse mutuamente. Puedes encontrar un lugar para esconderte, descansar o recuperarte entre otros disidentes. Ellos te ayudarán a protegerte de los que te persiguen, posiblemente incluso arriesgando sus vidas por ti.

items.name: Competencias en herramientas:
items.entry: {@item Thieves' tools|phb}, un tipo de {@filter herramientas del artesano|items|source=phb|miscellaneous=mundane|type=artisan's tools}

items.name: Equipamiento:
items.entry: Un {@item holy symbol|phb}, un juego de {@item traveler's clothes|phb}, y un cinturón {@item pouch|phb} que contiene 15 gp

entries.name: Artículo: Autoridad jurídica
entries: Como inquisidor de la Iglesia, tienes autoridad para arrestar a los criminales. En ausencia de otras autoridades, estás autorizado a emitir juicios e incluso a ejecutar sentencias. Sin embargo, si abusas de este poder, tus superiores en la iglesia podrían quitártelo.

_.displayName: evidence from a past case (choose one or roll for a trinket from the {@item Horror Trinket|VRGR|Horror Trinkets})

items.name: Habilidades:
items.entry: Elija dos de entre {@skill Insight}, {@skill Investigation} o {@skill Perception}

items.name: Equipamiento:
items.entry: Un {@item magnifying glass|PHB}, pruebas de un caso pasado (elige una o tira para conseguir una baratija del {@item Horror Trinket|VRGR|Horror Trinkets} más adelante en este capítulo), un {@item Common Clothes|PHB|set of common clothes} y 10 gp.

entries.name: Reportaje: Investigación oficial
entries: Tienes experiencia en conseguir acceso a personas y lugares para obtener la información que necesitas. Gracias a una combinación de rapidez, determinación y documentación de aspecto oficial, puedes acceder a un lugar o a una persona relacionados con un delito que estás investigando. Las personas que no están implicadas en tu investigación evitan obstaculizarte o pasar de tus peticiones. Además, las fuerzas del orden locales tienen opiniones firmes sobre ti, considerándote una molestia o uno de los suyos.

entries.name: Camino al misterio
entries: Su primer caso influyó en el tipo de misterios que le interesan. ¿Por qué este caso fue tan impactante, personal o traumático? ¿A quiénes afectó además de a ti? ¿Por qué y cómo te involucraste? ¿Se resolvió? ¿Cómo te llevó a investigar otros misterios? Rueda o elige los detalles de la tabla del Primer Caso para desarrollar el misterio que inició tu carrera como investigador.

entries.caption: First Case
rows: A friend was wrongfully accused of murder. You tracked down the actual killer, proving your friend's innocence and starting your career as a detective.
You're told you went missing for weeks. When you were found, you had no memory of being gone. Now you search to discover what happened to you.
You helped a spirit find peace by finding its missing corpse. Ever since, other spectral clients have sought you out to help them find rest.
You revealed that the monsters terrorizing your home were illusions created by a cruel mage. The magic-user escaped, but you've continued to uncover magical hoaxes.
You were wrongfully accused and convicted of a crime. You managed to escape and seek to help others avoid the experience you suffered, even while still being pursued by the law.

You survived the destructive use of a magic device that wiped out your home. Members of a secret organization found you. You now work with them, tracking down dangerous supernatural phenomena and preventing them from doing harm.
You found evidence of a conspiracy underpinning society. You tried to expose this mysterious cabal, but no one believed you. You're still trying to prove what you know is true.
You got a job with an agency that investigates crimes that local law enforcement can't solve. You often wonder which you value more, the truth or your pay.

entries.name: Características del terror
entries: Los personajes de una campaña centrada en el terror pueden tener motivaciones y características distintas. Utiliza las siguientes tablas para complementar las características sugeridas por tu trasfondo o para inspirar las de tu propio diseño.

entries.caption: Horror Character Personality Traits
rows: I had an encounter that I believe gives me a special affinity with a supernatural creature or event.
A signature piece of clothing or distinct weapon serves as an emblem of who I am.
I never accept that I'm out of my depth.
I must know the answer to every secret. No door remains unopened in my presence.
I let people underestimate me, revealing my full competency only to those close to me.
I compulsively seek to collect trophies of my travels and victories.
It doesn't matter if the whole world's against me. I'll always do what I think is right.
I have morbid interests and a macabre aesthetic.
I have a personal ritual, mantra, or relaxation method I use to deal with stress.
Nothing is more important than life, and I never leave anyone in danger.
I'm quick to jump to extreme solutions. Why risk a lesser option not working?
I'm easily startled, but I'm not a coward.

entries.caption: Horror Character Ideals
rows: Adrenaline. I've experienced such strangeness that now I feel alive only in extreme situations.
Balance. I strive to counter the deeds of someone for whom I feel responsible.
Bound. I've wronged someone and must work their will to avoid their curse.
Escape. I believe there is something beyond the world I know, and I need to find it.
Legacy. I must do something great so that I'm remembered, and my time is running out.
Misdirection. I work vigorously to keep others from realizing my flaws or misdeeds.
Obsession. I've lived this way for so long that I can't imagine another way.
Obligation. I owe it to my people, faith, family, or teacher to continue a vaunted legacy.
Promise. My life is no longer my own. I must fulfill the dream of someone who's gone.
Revelation. I need to know what lies beyond the mysteries of death, the world, or the Mists.
Sanctuary. I know the forces at work in the world and strive to create islands apart from them.
Truth. I care about the truth above all else, even if it doesn't benefit anyone.

entries.caption: Horror Character Bonds
rows: I desperately need to get back to someone or someplace, but I lost them in the Mists.
Everything I do is in the service of a powerful master, one I must keep a secret from everyone.
I owe much to my vanished mentor. I seek to continue their work even as I search to find them.
I've seen great darkness, and I'm committed to being a light against it—the light of all lights.
Someone I love has become a monster, murderer, or other threat. It's up to me to redeem them.
The world has been convinced of a terrible lie. It's up to me to reveal the truth.
I deeply miss someone and am quick to adopt people who remind me of them.
A great evil dwells within me. I will fight against it and the world's other evils for as long as I can.
I'm desperately seeking a cure to an affliction or a curse, either for someone close to me for myself.
Spirits are drawn to me. I do all I can to help them find peace.
I use my cunning mind to solve mysteries and find justice for those who've been wronged.
I lost someone I care about, but I still see them in guilty visions, recurring dreams, or as a spirit.

entries.caption: Horror Character Flaws
rows: I believe doom follows me and that anyone who gets close to me will face a tragic end.
I'm convinced something is after me, appearing in mirrors, dreams, and places where no one could.
I'm especially superstitious and live life seeking to avoid bad luck, wicked spirits, or the Mists.
I've done unspeakable evil and will do anything to prevent others from finding out.
I am exceptionally credulous and believe any story or legend immediately.
I'm a skeptic and don't believe in the power of rituals, religion, superstition, or spirits.
I know my future is written and that anything I do will lead to a prophesied end.
I need to find the best in everyone and everything, even when that means denying obvious malice.
I've seen the evil of a type of place—like forests, cities, or graveyards—and resist going there.
I'm exceptionally cautious, planning laboriously and devising countless contingencies.
I have a reputation for defeating a great evil, but that's a lie and the wicked force knows.
I know the ends always justify the means and am quick to make sacrifices to attain my goals.

items.name: Competencias en herramientas:
items.entry: Un tipo de {@filter set de juego|items|source=phb|miscellaneous=mundane|type=gaming set}, {@filter vehículos (terrestres)|items|source=phb;dmg|miscellaneous=mundane|type=vehicle (land)}

items.name: Equipamiento:
items.entry: Un conjunto de oscuridad {@item common clothes|phb}, {@item pack saddle|phb}, {@item burglar's pack|phb}, y un cinturón {@item pouch|phb} que contiene 5 gp

entries.name: Estilo de vida
entries: Pobre

entries.name: Visión general
entries: La Ruta del Hierro, que en su día fue la principal ruta comercial entre Phlan y la Fortaleza de Zhentil, solía ser un lugar de amplio bandidaje hasta la reciente ocupación de Phlan. Tu tiempo como antiguo bandido te ha dado mucha experiencia en la silla de montar y una habilidad para adquirir y tasar las monturas, mascotas y vehículos de otras personas, entre otras cosas. Este conjunto de habilidades en particular se ha vuelto muy lucrativo para ti al trabajar en la clandestinidad como ladrón de caballos para un gremio local de ladrones y otras organizaciones oscuras.

entries.name: Reportaje: El criador del mercado negro
entries: Sabe cómo encontrar a personas que siempre están buscando animales y vehículos robados, ya sea para proveer a las peleas de foso de animales, o para suministrar a algunos pícaros desesperados los medios para huir más rápido en monturas durante un trabajo ilegal. Este contacto no sólo te proporciona información sobre qué animales y vehículos están en alta demanda en la zona, sino que también te ofrece darte favores e información (a elección del DM) si les llevas dichos animales y vehículos. Nota: Esta es una variante de la función de Contacto Criminal.

rows: If people leave their gear unsecured, they must not want it very much.
I feel more comfortable sleeping under the open sky.
I always pre-plan my escape should things go bad; I always like to have an exit strategy.
I tend to give animal owners breeding and care advice whether or not they want it.
I lost a pet as a child and sadly reflect on it to this day.
I always form a powerful, emotional bond with my mount.
I recoil at the thought of killing someone else's pet or mount.
I prefer to hang to the back of a scuffle or discussion. Better to have my enemies in front of me.
Loyalty. Never bite the hand that feeds. (Good)
Unpredictability. Keep your enemy guessing and off-balance like a confused deer. (Chaotic)
Power. I strive to become leader of the pack at all costs. (Lawful)
Freedom. I bow to no one I don't respect. (Chaotic)
Resourcefulness. Our wits are our most valuable resource in troubled times. (Any)
Unity. Lone wolves fail where the pack succeeds. (Any)
I cannot leave a harmed animal behind; I must save it or put it out of its misery.
I leave behind my own personal calling cards when I do a job.
I do not trust people who do not have a pet, mount, or furry companion.
The pelt I wear on my back was from an animal that died saving my life, I will always cherish it.
If my pet does not like you, I do not like you!
Once you've ridden with me and fought by my side, I'll be there for you odds be damned.
I talk to animals; I believe they understand me, even if they do not.
I growl at and bite anyone who gets too close to my food while I am eating.
I strongly dislike enclosed spaces and require intoxication or firm encouragement to enter them.
I robbed the wrong caravan once. The owner is a powerful merchant who holds a grudge.
I'm an inveterate gambler.
I judge people based on how well they stand their ground in a fight. I got not time for cowards...

_.special: the charred and twisted remains of a failed experiment

items.name: Competencias en herramientas:
items.entry: Un tipo de {@filter herramientas del artesano|items|source=phb|miscellaneous=mundane|type=artisan's tools}

items.name: Idiomas:
items.entry: Elige uno de los draconianos, los goblins o los vedalken

items.name: Equipamiento:
items.entry: Una insignia Izzet, un conjunto de {@filter herramientas del artesano|items|source=phb|miscellaneous=mundane|type=artisan's tools}, los restos carbonizados y retorcidos de un experimento fallido, un {@item hammer|phb}, un {@item block and tackle|phb}, un conjunto de {@item common clothes|phb}, y un cinturón {@item pouch|phb} que contiene 5 gp (Azorius 1-zino coins)

entries.name: Reportaje: Infraestructuras urbanas
entries: La concepción popular de la Liga Izzet se basa en inventos locos, experimentos peligrosos y explosiones. Gran parte de esa percepción es correcta, pero la Liga también se dedica a tareas mundanas de construcción y arquitectura, principalmente a la creación de la infraestructura que permite a los ravnicanos disfrutar de agua corriente, plataformas levitantes y otras maravillas mágicas y tecnológicas.

Tienes un conocimiento básico de la estructura de los edificios, incluyendo lo que hay detrás de las paredes. También puedes encontrar los planos de un edificio concreto para conocer los detalles de su construcción. Dichos planos pueden proporcionar información sobre puntos de entrada, puntos débiles de la estructura o espacios secretos. Tu acceso a esta información no es ilimitado. Si la obtención o el uso de la información te mete en problemas con la ley, el gremio no puede protegerte de las repercusiones.

entries.name: Hechizos del Gremio Izzet
entries: {@i Prerrequisito: Hechizo o característica de clase Pacto Mágico}

Para ti, los hechizos de la tabla de Hechizos del Gremio Izzet se añaden a la lista de hechizos de tu clase de hechicero. (Si eres un personaje multiclase con varias listas de hechizos, estos hechizos se añaden a todas ellas).

entries.caption: Izzet Guild Spells
rows: Cantrip
{@spell produce flame}, {@spell shocking grasp}
1st
{@spell chaos bolt|XGE}, {@spell create or destroy water}, {@spell unseen servant}
2nd
{@spell heat metal}, {@spell rope trick}
3rd
{@spell call lightning}, {@spell elemental weapon}, {@spell glyph of warding}
4th
{@spell conjure minor elementals}, {@spell divination}, {@spell Otiluke's resilient sphere}
5th
{@spell animate objects}, {@spell conjure elemental}

entries: Tus hechizos tienden a ser ruidosos, llamativos o explosivos, incluso cuando el efecto es poco llamativo. Por ejemplo, cuando abres el portal de un hechizo {@spell rope trick}, el portal puede quedar delineado por inofensivos y vistosos destellos.

Si utilizas un foco arcano, probablemente adopte la forma de un intrincado dispositivo que podría incluir guanteletes de metal, botes de cristal, tubos de cobre y correas de cuero que lo sujetan a tu cuerpo. El {@item mizzium apparatus|GGR} descrito en {@book chapter 5|GGR|4|Mizzium Apparatus} es una versión mágica de este equipo.
El hechizo {@spell chaos bolt|XGE} es uno de los favoritos de los hechiceros Izzet por su naturaleza impredecible.

entries.name: Características sugeridas
entries: Los miembros de la Liga Izzet encarnan una combinación de energía caótica y frenética con curiosidad intelectual, en proporciones variables. Algunos se dedican a actividades académicas, y a otros simplemente les gustan las explosiones.

entries.caption: Personality Traits
rows: I have a hard time staying focused on... oh, and my brain tends to jump from one... did I mention focus?
I get really excited about my ideas and I can't wait to talk about them and start putting them into practice and tinkering with them and I want to tell you about how exciting it all is!
It's not magic—or anything, really—if you do it only halfway. Whatever I do, I give it all I've got.
I do what my gut tells me.
Life's an experiment, and I can't wait to see what happens.
I pepper my speech with the incomprehensible jargon of my trade, like mizzium droplets inserted into a weird-field suspension.
Great ideas are fine, but great results are what counts.
If you can guess what I'm about to do, that means I've run out of imagination.

entries.caption: Ideals
rows: {@b Guild}. My guild is all that really matters. (Any)
{@b Creativity}. Half the world's troubles come from stodgy thinking, stuck in the past. We need innovative solutions. (Chaotic)
{@b Discovery}. Every experiment has the potential to reveal more secrets of the multiverse. (Any)
{@b Science}. A rigorous application of logical principles and protocols will lead us toward progress more surely than any belief system. (Lawful)
{@b Fun}. I love my job! Despite the dangerous working conditions, there's nothing I'd rather do. (Chaotic)
{@b Power}. Someday I'll find or create the magic that will make me the most powerful being in Ravnica. (Evil)

entries.caption: Bonds
rows: I have dedicated my life to finding a solution to a scientific problem.
I'll never forget the laboratory where I learned my skills, or the other attendants who learned alongside me.
I'm convinced it was sabotage that destroyed my first laboratory and killed many of my friends, and I seek revenge against whoever did it.
I have the schematics for an invention that I hope to build one day, once I have the necessary resources.
A fellow student and I are racing to solve the same scientific puzzle.
I would do anything the guildmaster told me to do.

entries.caption: Flaws
rows: If there's a plan, I'll probably forget it. If I don't forget it, I'll probably ignore it.
I get bored easily, and if nothing is happening I'll make something happen.
Nothing is ever simple, and if it seems simple, I'll find a way to make it complicated.
I tend to ignore sleep for days when I'm conducting research, often at the expense of my own health and safety.
I'm convinced there's not a soul in Ravnica, except maybe the great Niv-Mizzet, who can match my boundless intellect.
I'm incapable of admitting a flaw in my logic.

entries.name: Contactos
entries: Los laboratorios de la Liga de Izzet están constantemente poniendo en marcha nuevos proyectos y disolviendo los antiguos, por lo que es fácil que hasta el más humilde de los asistentes haga amigos (y enemigos) en los laboratorios de toda Rávnica.
Tira dos veces en la tabla de Contactos Izzet (para un aliado y un rival) y una vez en la tabla de Contactos No Izzet.

entries.caption: Izzet Contacts
rows: An older relative is a member of the guild's board of directors.
I know a sprite who carries important messages among the guild's laboratories.
A sibling is the head of a laboratory doing exotic research.
A former colleague is now an attendant in a laboratory in the central guildhall.
I'm in regular communication with an instructor who set me on the course of my life and research.
I had a romance with a chemister working in the Blistercoils.
As an attendant, I had a fierce rivalry with another attendant for our supervisor's attention.
The guildmaster, Niv-Mizzet, took note of one of my experiments!

entries.caption: Non-Izzet Contacts
rows: An Azorius inspector seems interested in my work.
I was ready to join the Boros before I decided on Izzet, and I sometimes still hear from the sergeant who tried to recruit me.
One of my former assistants turned out to be a Dimir spy. We're not on friendly terms anymore, but we have a habit of running into each other.
A Golgari assassin killed a bitter rival of mine, leaving me with conflicted feelings.
I helped a minor Gruul chieftain acquire an Izzet weapon.
Roll an additional Izzet contact; you can decide if the contact is an ally or a rival.
An Orzhov banker financed my laboratory's current work and expects great returns.
I have a cousin in the Cult of Rakdos, and we get along quite well.
A former attendant from the same laboratory ran off to join the Selesnya, and we get into a big argument every time we run into each other.
I compare notes and techniques with a Simic scientist over lunch sometimes.

entries.name: ¿Cómo encajo?
entries: Sea cual sea tu papel en la Liga Izzet, se espera que contribuyas a su investigación de alguna manera. Esa contribución puede implicar la participación en pruebas, ya sea como asistente, investigador o sujeto. Puedes ser uno de los soldados que protegen un laboratorio, o un obrero responsable de levantar piezas pesadas de equipo en su lugar. La contribución de todos es importante, aunque los Izzet saben que algunos son más importantes que otros.

items.name: Equipamiento:
items.entry: Una insignia de rango, un {@item playing card set|phb|deck of cards}, un conjunto de {@item common clothes|PHB}, y un {@item pouch|PHB} que contiene 10 gp

entries.name: Reportaje: Escudero de Solamnia
entries: Ganas la proeza {@feat Squire of Solamnia|DSotDQ}.
Además, los Caballeros de Solamnia te proporcionan gratuitamente un modesto alojamiento y comida en cualquiera de sus fortalezas o campamentos.

entries.name: Construir un personaje de Caballero de Solamnia
entries: Cualquier clase que tenga destreza marcial puede encajar bien en los Caballeros de Solamnia. {@class Fighter||Fighters} y {@class paladin||paladins} forman el grueso de las fuerzas de la caballería. {@class Cleric||Clerics} (a menudo con el dominio {@class Cleric|PHB|War|War}) también pueden encontrarse entre las filas de los caballeros.

Para un personaje de Caballero de Solamnia más inusual, considera interpretar a un bardo del {@class Bard|PHB|College of Valor|Valor} (o al {@class Bard|PHB|College of Swords|Swords|XGE} del {@book Xanathar's Guide to Everything|XGE}) o a un {@class barbarian} devoto de los ideales del dios de la naturaleza {@deity Habbakuk|dragonlance} (quizás adoptando al {@class barbarian||Path of the Zealot|Zealot|xge} del {@book Xanathar's Guide to Everything|XGE}).

entries.name: Baratijas de Caballero de Solamnia
entries: Cuando hagas tu personaje, tira una vez en la tabla de Baratijas del Caballero de Solamnia en vez de en la {@item Trinket|PHB|Trinkets table} del Manual del Jugador para tu baratija inicial.

entries.caption: Knight of Solamnia Trinkets
rows: A flat silver disk you record your heroics upon
A piece of a fallen knight's armor
A pendant featuring a crown, a rose, or a sword
The pommel of your mentor's sword
A meaningful favor from someone you defended—perhaps a handkerchief or glove
A locket with a sketch of a silver dragon inside

_.special: signet, banner, or seal representing your place or rank in the order

items.name: Habilidades:
items.entry: {@skill Persuasion}, más uno de entre {@skill Arcana}, {@skill History}, {@skill Nature} y {@skill Religion}, según corresponda a su pedido

items.name: Competencias en herramientas:
items.entry: Puede elegir entre un {@filter set de juego|items|source=phb|miscellaneous=mundane|type=gaming set} o un {@filter instrumento musical|items|source=phb|miscellaneous=mundane|type=instrument}

items.name: Equipamiento:
items.entry: Un conjunto de {@item traveler's clothes|phb}, un sello, estandarte o sello que represente tu lugar o rango en la orden, y un {@item pouch|phb} que contenga 10 gp.

entries.name: Reportaje: Caballerosa mirada
entries: Recibes refugio y ayuda de los miembros de tu orden de caballería y de aquellos que simpatizan con sus objetivos. Si tu orden es religiosa, puedes obtener ayuda de los templos y otras comunidades religiosas de tu deidad. Los caballeros de órdenes cívicas pueden obtener ayuda de la comunidad -ya sea un asentamiento solitario o una gran nación- a la que sirven, y los caballeros de órdenes filosóficas pueden encontrar ayuda de aquellos a los que han ayudado en la búsqueda de sus ideales, y de aquellos que comparten sus ideales.

Esta ayuda viene en forma de alojamiento y comida, y de curación cuando es apropiado, así como ocasionalmente una ayuda arriesgada, como una banda de ciudadanos locales que se reúnen para ayudar a un caballero muy presionado, o aquellos que apoyan a la orden ayudando a sacar a un caballero de la ciudad cuando está siendo perseguido injustamente.

entries.name: Características sugeridas
entries: Utiliza las tablas de trasfondo {@background soldier} del Manual del Jugador como base para tus rasgos y motivaciones, modificando las entradas cuando sea apropiado para adaptarlas a tu identidad como caballero de tu orden.

Su vínculo casi siempre implica a la orden a la que pertenece (o al menos a los miembros clave de la misma), y es muy raro que el ideal de un caballero no refleje la agenda, el sentimiento o la filosofía de su orden.

items.name: Equipamiento:
items.entry: Un {@item Ink (1-ounce bottle)|PHB|bottle of black ink}, un {@item ink pen|PHB}, un {@item hammer|PHB}, un {@item hooded lantern|PHB}, un {@item tinderbox|PHB}, un tomo de historia, un uniforme escolar y un {@item pouch|phb} que contiene 15 gp.

entries.name: Artículo: Iniciado Lorehold
entries: Ganas la proeza {@feat Strixhaven Initiate|SCC} y debes elegir Lorehold dentro de ella.

Además, si tienes la característica de Hechicería o Magia de Pacto, los hechizos de la tabla de Hechizos de Lorehold se añaden a la lista de hechizos de tu clase de hechicero. (Si eres un personaje multiclase con varias listas de hechizos, estos hechizos se añaden a todas ellas).

entries.caption: Lorehold Spells
rows: 1st
{@spell Comprehend Languages}, {@spell Identify}
2nd
{@spell Borrowed Knowledge|SCC}, {@spell Locate Object}
3rd
{@spell Speak with Dead}, {@spell Spirit Guardians}
4th
{@spell Arcane Eye}, {@spell Stone Shape}
5th
{@spell Flame Strike}, {@spell Legend Lore}

entries: Considera la posibilidad de personalizar el aspecto de tus hechizos cuando los lanzas. Tus hechizos de Lorehold pueden crear pantallas de luz dorada. Puedes utilizar un tomo o un pergamino como foco de lanzamiento de hechizos, y los efectos de tus hechizos pueden reflejar la apariencia de los libros de referencia que estudias.

entries.name: Construir un personaje Lorehold
entries: Cualquier clase o subclase que se ocupe del conocimiento del pasado puede encajar bien en Lorehold. Los bardos prosperan en Lorehold, y los magos (especialmente los del {@class Wizard|PHB|School of Divination|Divination|PHB}) son numerosos entre sus estudiantes. Los clérigos (a menudo con los dominios {@class Cleric|PHB|Knowledge|Knowledge|PHB} o {@class Cleric|PHB|Light|Light|PHB}) también son bastante comunes.
